202404328697368578.text: Nothing will be easy, nothing will be given, but nothing is inaccessible to the will.

202403130464411648.text: Everything that makes Paris progress advances France.

202385896736161793.text: In greeting today the memory of J. Ferry, great minister of public education, I know nothing of his political errors.

202385835889405952.text: Every example knows limits, all greatness has its weaknesses, and every man is fallible.

202384205378879488.text: The school must be assured of its resources, we can not teach properly without adequate supervision for our children.

202322454977314817.text: It's time to put production back before speculation. Sustainable employment before immediate profit.

202322276786515969.text: I will fight against racism, anti-Semitism and against all discrimination.

202322187414290433.text: I will reaffirm in all circumstances our intangible principle of secularism.

202321860669603840.text: Our differences should not become divisions, our diversities should not become discords.

202321572332175360.text: The first condition of renewed confidence is the unity of the nation.

202321488181854208.text: There are no fatalities when a common will drives us and we fully mobilize the strengths and assets of France

202321238327164928.text: I measure the weight of the constraints facing our country.

202321036287545346.text: The French gave me a mandate to restore France to justice.

202320566408065026.text: I give French people a message of hope.

202076110098403328.text: The majority must be broad, solid and loyal to support the government, take initiatives and enhance the role of Parliament.

202075802848854016.text: It's because it's difficult for the French to turn to us. For the effort to be right.

202075554797715456.text: If what was waiting for us was not hard, we would not have won the presidential election.

202075375055015937.text: It is a heavy responsibility entrusted to me, in a context of exceptional gravity.

202074650690322433.text: Finally, the fifth condition of victory is to climb to the level of France.

202074507400331264.text: The fourth condition of victory is the will!

202074398344228864.text: The third condition of victory is to embody the spirit of the gathering, facing divisions, breaks.

202074169570115584.text: The second condition of victory is the passing, the overcoming of divisions.

202073991127646209.text: The first condition of victory is unity. This time, the unit was at the rendezvous.

202072692722106369.text: Experience shows that nothing is possible without the support of a large party.

202072230765662208.text: The head of state must not be the head of everything.

202071971951947776.text: Tomorrow I will be the President of all the French.

200938247956856834.text: My departure from Corrèze reminds me of both pride and a little nostalgia. But nostalgia fades, pride takes over.

199221270754242562.text: May 6 must be a great date for our country, a new start for Europe, a new hope for the world!

199220851671969793.text: It is this French Dream that I will strive to accomplish for the mandate I have been given.

199220554455195649.text: I mentioned the last few months the French Dream: it is our History, it is our future. It's simply called progress!

199220087935336449.text: I ask to be judged on two major commitments: justice and youth!

199219655129317377.text: I will be the President of all the French!

198496314491797504.text: The left wins a presidential election only when it is able to be at the height of France! # Perigueux

198496053845168129.text: Just for young people, this is the first step of a great adventure: that of a France that is moving forward! # Perigueux

198495184646971392.text: We will finish with fatalities, inequalities. Justice is the soul of the Republic! # Perigueux

198493817119313920.text: Convictions prevail over all considerations. # Perigueux

198493574717915136.text: The French dream finally gave independence to what were called "colonies". # Perigueux

198493135339401217.text: I am sure of nothing, but convinced that we will be able to give our country a new phase of its destiny! # Perigueux

198491307973410816.text: We will write a new page of History! # Perigueux

198490470106660864.text: European governments also want change! # Perigueux

198490100861108225.text: You will not only decide the fate of France, but also the direction of Europe! # Perigueux

198489868895137793.text: Everywhere in Europe, Sunday, only one question will be asked: who is the next President of the French Republic!

198489547217190915.text: Be proud of what you are! # Perigueux

198489459543654401.text: We must be the actors who bring hope and not fear. # Perigueux

198489189891850241.text: The most tasty moment of the debate was when I said "I President of the Republic, I will respect the rules of behavior"!

198488609890893824.text: Yes, our country must recover, must be stronger economically, industrially. # Perigueux

198488338037080064.text: In the France I want, there are only citizens with equal rights and duties! # Perigueux

198488034939912192.text: It is the Republicans who will allow victory on Sunday! # Perigueux

198487943097229312.text: I am the candidate of a rally wider than that of the left, even if I am socialist! # Perigueux

198487388115304448.text: I call you to mobilization, commitment, voting! # Perigueux

198487311648948226.text: During the debate, I wanted to tell the incumbent what you, for 5 years, had wanted to express! # Perigueux

198486878784204800.text: During the debate, I wanted to give you pride! # Perigueux

198486650014281728.text: Here again, the stranger was put in the heart of the campaign: I say it here, immigration is not the subject of this campaign!

198486416546734080.text: The incumbent did not stop going on the National Front! # Perigueux

198485764617674752.text: As long as we have mobilized all our strength, then doubt will always be present! # Perigueux

198485702357417985.text: I have come to tell you that the victory is still uncertain. # Perigueux

198485539610046464.text: What is at stake is the fate of France: to know if it can resume the march towards progress, towards justice! # Perigueux

198485307946041344.text: The stakes are of greater importance: it is not only a matter of giving a sanction, of dismissing an outgoing president. # Perigueux

198484554611302400.text: I expect you to give me, here in the Dordogne, the best possible result to win! # Perigueux

198484384268042241.text: We will give a successor to François Mitterrand! # Perigueux # FH2012

198484277535571968.text: The appointment we have with the French in two days is to give hope to France! # Perigueux

198439791988187136.text: Dear friends, the door-to-door goal has been reached: more than 5 million doors have been opened by my team! Together towards victory!

198346309378379776.text: The highlights of our last big gathering, yesterday, place du Capitole in #Toulouse are to see here: http://t.co/4ss9VTS0 # FH2012

198167446182563840.text: I'll meet you tomorrow morning from 7:30 on #RTL! Together for the victory! # FH2012

198142826939297792.text: H-26 before the end of the official campaign: regions commit themselves for change! Join them: http://t.co/HWENHORV # FH2012

198121095390433280.text: Find here the speech I made tonight at #Toulouse: http://t.co/DAKSUzLM # FH2012

198105211519246338.text: I want a victory without resentment, without rancor. A victory that lifts us, a victory of trust, pride. #Toulouse

198105036650323971.text: I am a respectful, unifying candidate: a normal candidate for a normal presidency in the service of the Republic. #Toulouse

198104816982044673.text: The promise of #Toulouse is that if the French give me their trust, the President that I will be will look like the candidate I am.

198104478489133056.text: I call you to mobilize as if you were a candidate for the presidential election. #Toulouse

198104009519800322.text: We must address a new generation that is rising and will know, I hope, the happiness of alternation and change.

198103586796863490.text: Victory is coming, I feel it coming! #Toulouse

198103443464916992.text: For all these years, the Republican promise has been suspended. #Toulouse

198103313818984448.text: Dear friends, the time of alternation has come. We have been waiting for this moment for so long! #Toulouse

198102860838354946.text: How can we accept in our country that a trader is better paid than a researcher? #Toulouse

198102457673449472.text: We must win! 3 days for 5 years: 3 days of effort for 5 years of success! #Toulouse

198101989115183104.text: I heard your call: "French left do not disappoint us, succeed, give the youth a better future"! #Toulouse

198101799163539458.text: We will have the immense responsibility to succeed. I did not propose anything that I could not handle. #Toulouse

198101690094854146.text: I love the French even more after this campaign and I'm still suspicious of money! #Toulouse

198101547551436801.text: There was no place where I went without the youth coming to me to ask me the place it deserves! #Toulouse

198100120569516032.text: There is justice: when we have been the President of failure, we can not be the candidate of hope! #Toulouse

198099872040230914.text: And today, there is no statement from a European official without returning to the growth objective. It's good ! #Toulouse

198099686190620674.text: At first, skepticism was so great when we said we wanted to renegotiate the fiscal compact! #Europe #Toulouse

198099025138954240.text: The border that must be laid is the boundary between general interest and special interests! #Toulouse

198098506559389696.text: There are not two France who are fighting each other, but a France that must choose its destiny. #Toulouse

198098355413458944.text: The main risk is that the right can stay 5 more years in power. #Toulouse

198098296609325056.text: The main risk is not alternation. Alternation is a chance! #Toulouse

198097990064422912.text: And this right would come to give us lessons of good management? No ! #Toulouse

198097899501002752.text: Unemployment is at a record level, growth has gone out, taxation has increased. #Toulouse

198097836942950401.text: What lesson could the right give us? #Toulouse

198096931690520577.text: Do not imagine that victory is here! Victory you will tear it from the hands of the right to offer to the whole people.

198096732595306496.text: I ask you not to give in to the ease, the frivolity and the naivety of thinking that it would be done. No ! #Toulouse

198096343380668416.text: The incumbent had proclaimed that he would be a mouthful of this debate. I'm afraid he's hungry. #Toulouse

198096217455067136.text: Ah, this debate! The outgoing candidate based him so much hope. You know his qualities of modesty, restraint, reserve. #Toulouse

198095694781890561.text: I have also made this wish: if we win, and we will win, I want it to erase the cruel memory of April 21, 2002. #Toulouse

198095202001489920.text: If I have given myself a goal, it is of course to be the President of France. #Toulouse

198094520175439872.text: I want to greet all the candidates who went to the primaries! #Toulouse

198094442027163649.text: I want to thank you already for this first effort. It was possible only because we gathered. #Toulouse

198094050409201664.text: I am today in #Toulouse, city of castagne and victory! # FH2012

198093967294857218.text: Follow my speech live at #Toulouse now! http://t.co/mQ68vX3P # FH2012

198069317655478273.text: Our last big gathering, live from the Capitol Square in #Toulouse, it's live and it's now! http://t.co/iiRTXv0z

197986427546509312.text: Dear friends, I'll meet you tonight from 6 pm Capitol Square in #Toulouse for our last big gathering!

197985423564341248.text: My reactions following the debate this morning on France Inter: http://t.co/afdsg7Ey #FInter # FH2012

197980634000535552.text: Find here my intervention this morning at "4 Vérités" on France 2: http://t.co/ge6TnpXU # FH2012

197831268900147202.text: Dear friends, I will be tomorrow morning the guest of the 4 truths on France 2 from 7:45 then on France Inter at 8:20! # FH2012

197805559116873729.text: I hope that the French will regain confidence and hope. #VoteHollande

197805493673136129.text: I want to be judged on the decisions I will make based on the test of justice. #VoteHollande

197805361237999616.text: I want Education to be the top priority because it is for youth that I want to embark on the next five years. #VoteHollande

197805248671260673.text: The choice is simple: do the French want to continue or change? #VoteHollande

197805181449158656.text: I want a change of direction on the European level. #VoteHollande

197805120484945921.text: I want to change my policy, my method. #VoteHollande

197805016143233025.text: In 2007, facing @RoyalSegolene, Mr Sarkozy wanted to be judged on his results. Everyone will judge. #VoteHollande

197804935507738625.text: The balance of Nicolas Sarkozy has been described as especially heavy. #VoteHollande

197804815957495808.text: We do not have the same project. #VoteHollande

197804732855758848.text: This debate was useful, it showed differences on economic, social, fiscal policies. #VoteHollande

197802525250945024.text: I consider that our mission in Afghanistan is complete. There is no reason to maintain our troops beyond 2012. #VoteHollande

197801576574885888.text: I consider it necessary to withdraw our fighting troops from Afghanistan before the end of 2012. #VoteHollande

197800977997369344.text: The Superior Council of the Judiciary will appoint the magistrates of the seat and the public prosecutor's office. #VoteHollande

197800571149885441.text: I will renounce the criminal statute of the Head of State. For all acts committed previously, there will be no more protection. #VoteHollande

197800370033008640.text: I will not name anyone unless the parliamentary committees decide by a two-thirds majority for. #VoteHollande

197797488533577730.text: I want to be a President who respects the French, who considers them. #VoteHollande

197795393956884480.text: Are we doing work on old plants or are we investing in renewable energy? I made my choice.

197794559386857473.text: We will close a nuclear power plant, the oldest in France: the Fessenheim power station. #VoteHollande

197792671773884416.text: I try to be consistent in my convictions. #VoteHollande

197792432107167745.text: The law on the burqa, if I become President of the Republic, will be strictly enforced. #VoteHollande

197792293200216064.text: I voted for the resolution banning the burqa. #VoteHollande

197790309399277568.text: What allows you to say that foreigners who are not European are Muslims? #VoteHollande

197789680870227969.text: I want people who pay local taxes to participate in municipal polls. #VoteHollande

197787840048930819.text: I consider that legal immigration must be mastered but we can not set criteria beyond reach. #VoteHollande

197787572074856448.text: For foreign students, I found the circular Guéant regrettable. #VoteHollande

197787491435155456.text: Economic immigration must be limited. We are in a period of unemployment and low growth. #VoteHollande

197786514443350016.text: Do not confuse your person with France! #VoteHollande

197786350290878464.text: My duty is to give another direction to Europe. #VoteHollande

197786254753017856.text: In this case compared to Germany, you did not get anything, you did not stand. #VoteHollande

197786095558209537.text: You tell me that you know how to compromise? #VoteHollande

197784921052430336.text: You did not create the financial transaction tax. You have reinstated the stock market tax that you had removed. #VoteHollande

197783701105549313.text: Without deficits shrinking since without growth, deficits can not be reduced. #Europe #VoteHollande

197783613436211201.text: We would be condemned forever to austerity. #Europe #VoteHollande

197783336712806400.text: There was no dimension of growth. We are imposing on countries a generalized austerity. #Europe #VoteHollande

197782922449793027.text: The crisis in the euro zone has been open for 3 years. Many delays have been made and we are paying the consequences. #VoteHollande

197782021643317248.text: We have lost the attractiveness of kindergarten: only 10% of children under 3 go to school. #VoteHollande

197781953368424450.text: The primary school supervision rate is the lowest in the OECD. #School #VoteHollande

197780211880837120.text: You increased the compulsory contributions under your five-year period by almost one and a half points. #VoteHollande

197779551298924545.text: Public service staff will be stabilized and public spending will not increase by more than 1% per year. #VoteHollande

197779179457093632.text: I protect children from the Republic. You, you protect the most privileged. It's your right. #VoteHollande

197778924707651584.text: What I recommend is that the most fortunate make checks to the public treasury! #VoteHollande

197778714086473728.text: You have distributed checks from the public treasury to the wealthy through the tax shield. #VoteHollande

197776540459745281.text: We will restore the wealth tax. #VoteHollande

197776472394571776.text: The tax loopholes will be capped at 10,000 euros. #VoteHollande

197776186867326976.text: We have an obligation: to balance our public accounts at the end of 2017. #VoteHollande

197775886748090368.text: Apart from the education budget, the country's first budget is interest on debt. #VoteHollande

197775770792378368.text: The public debt has increased by 600 billion euros since the beginning of the five-year period of N. Sarkozy. #VoteHollande

197775501077659649.text: The price of gas has increased by 60% and electricity by 20%. #VoteHollande

197773584947625984.text: Whatever happens, whatever happens, you are happy! #VoteHollande

197772629619392512.text: I am indeed from the Court of Auditors, please specify. My numbers are accurate. Everyone can testify. #VoteHollande

197770815012483073.text: Your foreign trade deficit is structural: it has been growing for five years each year. #VoteHollande

197770311821836288.text: With you, it's very simple: it's never your fault. You always have a scapegoat. #VoteHollande

197769626350915585.text: It's not you who ask the questions and you do not give notes in this exercise! #VoteHollande

197769011868598272.text: You invent a new tax on the French to have an effect on very small companies. Go understand!

197768462398001152.text: There are 4 million people registered at Pôle emploi, it is indisputable. There were 3 million when you were elected.

197768316549476352.text: On the numbers, I understand that it does not make you happy. #VoteHollande

197767117687365632.text: I will create the generation contract: http://t.co/doCx8a0O #VoteHollande

197766476709642240.text: Unemployment has risen by one million, it's a record. #VoteHollande

197766151944683521.text: The biggest victims were the French. #VoteHollande

197765663824154624.text: Mr. Sarkozy, you will have a hard time passing for a victim! #VoteHollande

197764838187995136.text: You say "there was no violence". Fortunately! #VoteHollande

197764716234424320.text: If you feel that for 5 years you have gathered the French, then I will give you discharge! #VoteHollande

197764398352314370.text: I want to come back to the rally. I think it's an essential notion. #VoteHollande

197763906050068480.text: Trust is essential for public action. #VoteHollande

197763835917119489.text: I want to be the president of the rally. For too many years the French have been opposed, I want to reunite them. #VoteHollande

197763721341317121.text: I want to be the President of the recovery of France. #VoteHollande

197763628936593408.text: I will be the President of justice, I want justice to be at the heart of all public decisions #VoteHollande

197763527652556801.text: I must say tonight what president I will be, if the French give me their confidence. #VoteHollande

197763408181997568.text: Sunday, the French will choose their next President of the Republic. #VoteHollande

197590656389095424.text: I decided that the public accounts will be in equilibrium at the end of 2017. #BFMTV

197589860930949120.text: I will reform the criminal status of the head of state. #BFMTV

197588507642961920.text: I will restore 12,000 jobs per year in the National Education. #BFMTV

197588097553285121.text: I will abolish the VAT increase decided by the current majority. #BFMTV

197587754429845504.text: We must succeed in keeping our works of art in our country! #BFMTV

197587557037510656.text: We need hospitals as public services. #BFMTV

197587000142995456.text: Today, 90% of estates are exempt, I will not question that. #BFMTV

197586809956483072.text: I want the pay gap in public companies to be between 1 and 20. #BFMTV

197586680339902464.text: The example must come from above. I will reduce salaries for the head of state and the government. #BFMTV

197584995236331520.text: It is SMEs that make the cash of large companies, which is not acceptable. #BFMTV

197584680575438848.text: I wish the right to vote for foreigners in municipal elections. #BFMTV

197584218631573505.text: If I'm not elected Sunday, I will not withdraw from politics. #BFMTV

197584073391214593.text: I think 100 members should be elected by proportional representation. #BFMTV

197583972304289792.text: As for the legislative election, I consider that there must be a proportional share, introduced as of 2017. #BFMTV

197583529297719296.text: I do not want to make taxation a spoliation, I want there to be justice. Everyone must lead by example. #BFMTV # FH2012

197583415569162241.text: How can important leaders pay for themselves without fully participating in national solidarity? #BFMTV

197583285268922369.text: 1 million euros is a very important income! #BFMTV

197582998319808512.text: The ceiling of the livret A will be doubled which will enable it to collect 20 billion euros for the construction of social housing. #BFMTV

197582834137956352.text: Upon my election, state lands will immediately be made available to local communities to build. #BFMTV

197582740030365697.text: Housing is both an economic activity, an element of growth and meets a need for the French. #BFMTV

197582160901840896.text: I trust the nuclear safety authority. #BFMTV # FH2012

197581840431853568.text: I will answer in a few moments the questions of the listeners of RMC. #BFMTV # FH2012

197580066312564736.text: There will be work from May 7th, but I do not know what the result will be, I'm building it. #BFMTV # FH2012

197579592192626688.text: I'll be Sunday night in Tulle, then I'll go back to Paris. #BFMTV # FH2012

197579425091551232.text: In a presidential campaign, no image should be confusing. #BFMTV # FH2012

197579331227230208.text: I think what I've been doing for a year is clarity, consistency and consistency. I do not change. #BFMTV # FH2012

197578853844131841.text: The central bank can lend directly to the states, or we will allow the European solidarity mechanism to be backed by the ECB.

197578624034017280.text: Why was the most expensive formula chosen to support states in difficulty? #Europe #BFMTV # FH2012

197578234001502208.text: It is on my project that the government will be formed. #BFMTV # FH2012

197577758237396992.text: I forwarded to all European partners my proposals for boosting growth in Europe. There is no pre-agreement. #BFMTV

197576602849259520.text: The criteria of regularization will be the same for all, there will be more arbitrary. #BFMTV # FH2012

197575937288699904.text: There are too many illegal immigrants in France. #BFMTV # FH2012

197575673466990592.text: There are not too many legal immigrants in France. #BFMTV # FH2012

197575506441404417.text: Promise, yes. Compromise me, no. #BFMTV # FH2012

197575280192270336.text: Unlike N. Sarkozy, I do not seat the extreme right. #BFMTV # FH2012

197574986259640320.text: A parade on May 1st is a parade of labor organizations! #BFMTV # FH2012

197574533224468480.text: Why do you think I put so much strength in my desire to renegotiate the European treaty? #BFMTV # FH2012

197574412118130688.text: I want to give priority to employment, in a very difficult context, but where there is room for action. #BFMTV

197574050875314177.text: I must be offensive to the French, to mark a point in a debate! #BFMTV

197389918073393152.text: I'll meet you tomorrow at 8:30 am on RMC-BFMTV! #Bourdin # FH2012

197382930941743105.text: The highlights of my tribute to Pierre Bérégovoy today at #Nevers are to be seen here: http://t.co/OQO3VmCY # 1May # FH2012

197382318745329664.text: I hope that the next head of state will have modesty for him and pretension for his country. # France3

197381548423655426.text: I want to tell you my message: a message of reconciliation and gathering. # France3

197381371424018432.text: The end of the campaign is based on fear by the incumbent. # France3

197381316138901504.text: I will not go back to a kind of funfair tomorrow! I have to go to another level. # Debate # France3

197381077688520704.text: I will not convince N. Sarkozy, my duty is to convince the French! # Debate # France3

197380890987462657.text: The challenge is simple: do the French want to continue with the incumbent? or do they want change? # France3

197380636632297472.text: I do not seduce, outbid, flattery with regard to this or that electorate. # France3

197380447116865538.text: This is not the first time a union has taken a position in an election. #Thibault # 1May # France3

197379960346918912.text: I wanted to pay tribute to Pierre Bérégovoy who was a trade unionist and served his country. # 1May # France3

197379873805832192.text: I wanted May 1st to be the feast of all workers! # 1May # France3

197359707499929600.text: I will be at 19:30 the guest of the newspaper of France 3! # France3 # FH2012

197320517492027392.text: Find the full speech I gave this afternoon at #Nevers: http://t.co/mnqzPeyC # 1May # FH2012

197298303145222144.text: I say to you: be proud to be citizens of the Republic. Do your duty, serve the Republic, serve the change! #May #Nevers

197298043115151360.text: And we will never forget May 10! #May #Nevers

197298003806126080.text: I wish so much that the young generations can live on May 1st, then May 6th, victory of the left, of the change! #May #Nevers

197297806627717120.text: We will always have beautiful birthdays in May! #May #Nevers

197297352300707840.text: The country is tired of what has been done for 5 years. #May #Nevers

197297213993521152.text: I will never yield to principles, values, and the Republic. #May #Nevers

197296986880352256.text: And I am the candidate who must expand further so that all those who want change are found in my application! #Nevers

197296775911059456.text: I am the candidate of all the left gathered! #May #Nevers

197295893333020672.text: My first priority will be employment. We will create the generation contract: http://t.co/doCx8a0O # 1May #Nevers

197295635140063232.text: It will change, and it will be called justice! #May #Nevers

197295551811813380.text: What I do not accept is that there has been a wealth tax relief of more than $ 2 billion! #May #Nevers

197294925354770434.text: The outgoing candidate thinks that the unemployed want to remain unemployed? What the unemployed are waiting for is work! #May #Nevers

197294301963755521.text: Why agitate once again the specter of the invasion? #Nevers

197293602454511616.text: The incumbent chose to condemn us to austerity. I denounce this orientation! # 1May #Europe #Nevers

197293350565593088.text: We have to give more room for growth, and in France, and in Europe! #May #Nevers

197292876407914496.text: We are all aware that the value of work must be defended, promoted, considered. #May #Nevers

197292459531837442.text: I will not accept that the outgoing candidate arrogates the work value! Who defends the value of work and who damages it? #May #Nevers

197292148054441984.text: The other day the incumbent was at the Concorde. This time, he is at odds! #May #Nevers

197291708940156928.text: Now the incumbent calls a party of "real" work! #May #Nevers

197291532146057216.text: Now the outgoing candidate discovers May 1st! This year he has been invited. #May #Nevers

197291206965862400.text: The sense of humanity that we give to this holiday must not be misguided! #May #Nevers

197290886521036800.text: May 1st is the feast of all the workers of the world! #May #Nevers

197290682459754497.text: Be proud, Nivernais, of having known Pierre Bérégovoy! #May #Nevers

197290320617144321.text: When one was a laborer, when one was a trade unionist, one knows that inflation is a bad thing that eats up. #May #Nevers

197290207169626112.text: Pierre Bérégovoy fought against inflation and modernized our country! #May #Nevers

197289822027653120.text: It is as a statesman that I also want to greet Pierre Bérégovoy. #May #Nevers

197289596583809024.text: I can not accept that there is here, in France, a battle of May 1st against unionism! #May #Nevers

197289432259366914.text: Labor Day is the feast of unionism! #May #Nevers

197289348041949185.text: I want to pay tribute to all the trade unionists in France! #May #Nevers

197289263807725568.text: I come here to pay homage to the great figure that was Pierre Bérégovoy. #Nevers

197289056219041792.text: I was in the Nièvre on May 10, 2011, 30 years after the victory of François Mitterrand. I told you "rendez-vous in 2012"! #Nevers

197288720448241664.text: Nièvre, land of victory for the left, which welcomes me once again! #Nevers

197288612721721345.text: I had many reasons to come here at #Nevers today! # 1May # FH2012

197286497475493888.text: Follow my speaking live right now at #Nevers: http://t.co/j9zdmulx # FH2012

197266998164586497.text: This morning I laid a wreath on the tomb of Pierre Beregovoy at Nevers. # 1May http://t.co/ZHCvCuNP

196965079932076032.text: The change is now! http://t.co/4w745mv0! #Mobilization # 6may # FH2012

196912041708093440.text: Yael Naim and David Donatien were yesterday at #Bercy: http://t.co/2IcJCeGX cc @yaelnaim # FH2012

196896123011600384.text: For all those who were not at #Bercy, here are the excerpts of my return on stage, after my speech: http://t.co/CjSwsVHz # FH2012

196891525349785600.text: Find my interview this morning on # Europe1: http://t.co/imGXTeNI # FH2012

196853568114917376.text: I made sure to be ready, if the French give me their confidence, from day one: http://t.co/zuUShNgL # Europe1

196852136397643776.text: I call for patriotism: to be French means to pay taxes! # Europe1

196851500255944706.text: I want a mechanism for indexing the Smic on prices and some of the growth. # Europe1

196849167526662145.text: If I want to be respected tomorrow, I must respect others. #Styndats # Europe1

196848655620255744.text: I will finance the creation of posts in the National Education by eliminating the tax relief on wealth. # Europe1

196847894920310785.text: If I am elected, we can enter a renegotiation. #Europe # Europe1

196847742482518016.text: There is an awareness in Europe. The word "growth" is back. # Europe1

196847176595415042.text: Illegal immigration is not acceptable. We must fight effectively against clandestine chains. # Europe1

196846522263027712.text: I do not think borders are the main subject of the presidential election! # Europe1

196846225079795713.text: The left, if elected on Sunday, will be fully associated with the country's responsibility. # Europe1

196845841594597376.text: In this campaign, I have not opposed two France. # Europe1

196845769737768960.text: An election is always a choice and therefore division. The role of the elected President is to reconcile. # Europe1

196840252982296577.text: Dominique Strauss-Kahn is not in the countryside and does not have to come back. # Europe1

196839890552492033.text: Social spending increases will be limited to 3%. # Europe1

196838986961002497.text: May 1st is a time when it is the trade unions that decide, it is not the parties who set the agenda. # Europe1

196838070765629440.text: I must be humble about the ballot. # Europe1

196631280589352960.text: The whole of my speech, this afternoon at #Bercy is to read here: http://t.co/1RBGyvGd # FH2012

196624214525091840.text: Thank you to everyone who came today to #Bercy! Nothing will stop the change that happens! http://t.co/ECnUPueS

196615821718589440.text: Thank you because without you, there is no victory possible! #Bercy

196615731398451201.text: I want the holiday, so festive there is, May 6, be the feast of the whole Republic! #Bercy

196615649987018752.text: I want France to say to herself, when she makes the choice of her destiny, that nobody will stay away! #Bercy

196615408596430848.text: I want the French to resume the good march of progress! #Bercy

196615300190441472.text: The victory I'm waiting for, who's here, I want it to be a happiness for everyone! #Bercy

196614800678191105.text: What we have to do more beautiful is not to discard but to choose! #Bercy

196614602505732096.text: We believe in a France that gives young people all their chances! #Bercy

196614546876678148.text: We believe in the Republic one and indivisible! We believe in justice! #Bercy

196614212645175296.text: It's not just about beating the right, it's about giving France confidence in it! #Bercy

196614064925966336.text: I want to end with arrogance, with privileges, with brutality, with injustices! #Bercy

196613790274555905.text: I want the next President of the Republic to be voluntary, dignified, fraternal and unifying! #Bercy

196613724306546690.text: Our campaign was voluntary, dignified, fraternal, unifying. #Bercy

196613339697258496.text: The head of state must not be the head of everything, responsible for nothing! #Bercy

196613179021856768.text: The state is the only good of those who do not have one! #Bercy

196613095970439172.text: I want to return the state to the citizens. For 5 years, the head of state has been so present and the state so absent! #Bercy

196612916886257665.text: Being the head of state presupposes having a conception of the state. Mine is the exemplary. #Bercy

196612383391748096.text: There will be so many inequalities to fight! The public hospital must be considered as a public service, no longer as a business! #Bercy

196612180781703168.text: What do we want: to protect the wealthy or the children of the Republic? I chose and the French will choose too! #Bercy

196611941739921408.text: The School of the Republic will be the budget priority of the next quinquennium! #Bercy

196611729403281408.text: I will send a memorandum to all European governments to initiate the renegotiation of the treaty! #Bercy

196611000731041793.text: We will set rules for competition: the rule of reciprocity! #Bercy

196610560534650881.text: We will have to support businesses! #Bercy

196610308301799427.text: Employment must be the first priority! This is the meaning of my proposal on the generation contract! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Bercy

196609992302936064.text: May 1st, respect for the trade unions! # 1ermai #Bercy

196609305552752641.text: The stakes of the election are first and foremost economic and social issues. The first concerns are employment and housing! #Bercy

196607958891761664.text: I do not do politics through religions! #Bercy

196607826238504960.text: I do not see appearances, I see only belongings to the Republic! #Bercy

196607616166801408.text: I demand the application of the strict principle of secularism throughout the country! #Bercy

196607431197995009.text: I do not accept that religions are instrumentalized in the public debate! #Bercy

196607331138674689.text: There are no two France that would confront each other. No, there is only France, France that will speak May 6! #Bercy

196607088976338944.text: It's always the same fear that the right installs! But it's actually his fear: his fear of leaving the power, to leave the place! #Bercy

196606547328114690.text: A beautiful victory is the one that speaks the truth and prepares the action. #Bercy

196606432236412928.text: I do not want to hide anything about the difficulties that lie ahead, but I want the French to regain a taste for trust! #Bercy

196606247942893568.text: The problems of our country will not disappear with the candidate-outgoing, it would be too simple! #Bercy

196606054795186176.text: The duty of a President is to gather and not to divide! #Bercy

196605971366297600.text: The first duty of a President is to solve problems and not to create others. #Bercy

196605484680224768.text: I want to win back men and women angry, a thousand times yes! But to promise to compromise, a thousand times no! #Bercy

196605046513860609.text: I want to address those who, beyond political sensitivities, are concerned about social cohesion! #Bercy

196604779911327746.text: Thank you @ Melenchon2012, thank you @EvaJoly, thank you to the left to be the appointment of the alternation, the rendezvous of victory! #Bercy

196604464113786881.text: Our duty is to give pride and honor to politics! #Bercy

196604249625468930.text: It would be useless to promise if it was to deny afterwards! #Bercy

196603722091081728.text: I am the heir of a social model erected by French resistance fighters! #Bercy

196603500745068544.text: I refused to flatter mediocre sentiments, to practice overbidding! #Bercy

196603398676680705.text: I wanted to address the best in all of us! #Bercy

196602928981737472.text: They are waiting for us, we are coming! #Bercy

196602882810855425.text: For months, the European peoples have been looking towards France! #Bercy

196602706792677376.text: Patriotism is loving oneself to love others! #Bercy

196602443008704512.text: It is patriotism that I oppose to nationalism. #Bercy

196602137101352960.text: France is great when it carries a universal message, of surpassing, elevation! #Bercy

196602092415234049.text: France has not accomplished on the fear of the other! # FH2012

196602012505350144.text: I want to reconnect with the French dream! #Bercy

196601818040647680.text: We have to gain trust. This word, trust, which is the most beautiful of the Republic! #Bercy

196601751833546754.text: We have to turn the page of a quinquennium of failure, and open together a new page of History! #Bercy

196601519263596546.text: I want to be the affirmation of a hope, a project, a will! #Bercy

196601441878671360.text: Even today, I want to remove doubts, mobilize energies, give meaning to what we do together! #Bercy

196601238899535873.text: Nothing is certain, we must not yield to the euphoria of moods, we must seek victory, be worthy, be proud of it! #Bercy

196600784266342403.text: We did better than in the first round of 1981! #Bercy

196600714968051716.text: You put me in the lead with a result that no socialist had so far obtained! #Bercy

196600343600181248.text: In a week, day to day, hour to hour, our fellow citizens will be deciding whether to continue or change! #Bercy

196600159776411650.text: We had been waiting for change for years! He is here, he is coming! #Bercy

195141827366617090.text: Without growth, there will be no opportunity for Europe to achieve its objectives and emerge from the eurozone crisis. # FH6mai

195141182098124801.text: The victory must be that of a new Europe. # FH6mai

194795920699817985.text: I send you a message of rallying and reconciliation: I need all the French. #Hirson # FH2012

194794923608915968.text: What do we prefer? Protect the richest or protect our children? I made the choice to protect our children! #Hirson # FH2012

193030399788724224.text: There are no two France fighting each other, there is a France that will have enough energy to master its destiny! #Cenon # FH2012

193030202903900164.text: To straighten France, it will be necessary to gather it! #Cenon # FH2012

193029456170987520.text: It is time to give France a successor to François Mitterrand. #Cenon # FH2012

193025291411652608.text: We must allow the generation that has just lived better than ours! #Cenon # FH2012

193024863202586625.text: I want to be a President who can take his choices and continue to meet the French. #Cenon # FH2012

193020285241405441.text: The stake of Sunday is not a classification, the stake of Sunday is to place at the highest the candidate of the change! #Cenon # FH2012

193019827370201088.text: The incumbent said he saw a wave. For once he was not mistaken: she arrives the wave! #Cenon # FH2012

193019613095792640.text: I feel your enthusiasm, it goes up, it goes up! #Cenon # FH2012

193019544908988416.text: An alternation is built around a will, that of a people who at one time stands up and asserts itself. #Cenon # FH2012

193019245054013440.text: An alternation is a sum of anger against injustices, against so many failures to the values ​​of the Republic. #Cenon

193018942263009280.text: An alternation always starts from a distance, it is never a fantasy, a whim. #Cenon # FH2012

192680541697482752.text: Before the first round, there is the need to bring me to the top if we want the change to happen! #ParoleDirect # FH2012

192596773821362178.text: What we are going to do on Sunday is a choice for France and a choice for the industry. #Homeholder # FH2012

192596720314626049.text: I am on the eve of a major fight, which is neither a personal fight nor a partisan fight. #Homeholder # FH2012

192596336489660419.text: This ministry could intervene, use the public investment bank! #Homeholder # FH2012

192596271888990209.text: I wish the government a productive pole. #Homeholder # FH2012

192595348324229120.text: It is up to the legislator to further strengthen the sanctions against entrepreneurs who behave badly! #Hunter # FH2012

192593668845219841.text: I want a reindustrialization plan. We will make sure that Still's record is a priority. #Hunter # FH2012

192592991217655808.text: The legislator will have to return to this LBO procedure (leveraged buy-out). #Industry #Housing # FH2012

192592773826875392.text: There was an "LBO", an operation that captures the substance of a business and then sell its business. #Homeholder # FH2012

192518222124285953.text: My interventions this morning on #FInter are to listen again here: http://t.co/NieqVZlI # FH2012

192506356522168322.text: There can be no accession of Turkey to the European Union if the conditions are not met. #FInter # FH2012

192505192393080832.text: The corporate tax will be different depending on whether the profits are distributed to the shareholders or reintegrated into the investment. # FH2012

192503914950705152.text: If I am head of state tomorrow, I will not be majority leader, party leader or leader of sensibility. #FInter # FH2012

192503343640350720.text: La Poste is the public service par excellence. #FInter # FH2012

192502781683310592.text: My mission will be to give all its independence to justice. #FInter # FH2012

192502263225389056.text: We can no longer support the policy we have been pursuing for five years, it is too hard for the French. #FInter # FH2012

192501915060412416.text: The presidential election is a relationship between the French and the candidate they have chosen. #FInter # FH2012

192500323846336512.text: I want a school shield! #FInter # FH2012

192499941288067073.text: We will start a process of increasing the SMIC over the entire five-year period, indexed to growth and prices. #FInter # FH2012

192499822383726592.text: I am aware that the SMIC has not had a "boost" for 4 years. ## FInter # FH2012

192499412717666304.text: I refuse the opposition between two lefts. All voters who will vote for the left want victory! #FInter # FH2012

192499124174725120.text: For the first time in a long time, the French presidential election is going to be a European election! #FInter # FH2012

192498957719576576.text: I can not accept that austerity is the rule of conduct of the states of the European Union for 10 years. #FInter # FH2012

192498723438338048.text: There is no reduction in deficits without growth! #FInter # FH2012

192498402087542784.text: I can not accept that Europe is in this state. #FInter # FH2012

192498342788464640.text: We will renegotiate the budget treaty to add what is missing: a component of growth, research and innovation. #FInter # FH2012

192498076055904257.text: I do not want to tie my policy to that of the IMF projection. #FInter # FH2012

192495761370517504.text: If elected, my first duty will be for everyone to be respected and respected, even those who did not vote for me! #FInter # FH2012

192492321382731777.text: My great cause is to make youth live better! #FInter # FH2012

192491146155532288.text: I set myself only one goal: neither a fire of straw nor a bonfire, but the victory! #FInter # FH2012

192490928890589184.text: I am in a few moments the guest of #FInter: http://t.co/xsVzPTgj # FH2012

192364449884151808.text: Find here the speech I made tonight at #Lille:: http://t.co/bPWIlQPA # FH2012

192326557493231616.text: We must make the choice of victory, the choice of the Republic, the choice of France! # 22avril #Lille # FH2012

192325687393259521.text: The donor club of the incumbent was Sunday at #Crillon, it is not invented, in the salon Marie-Antoinette! #Lille # FH2012

192325501682065408.text: The five-year period started in a big restaurant, it ends up in a big hotel! #Crillon #Lille # FH2012

192324601005608962.text: We owe respect to democracy! #Lille # FH2012

192324033273008128.text: The French are a free people, they will determine themselves sovereignly! # 22avril #Lille # FH2012

192323809888583680.text: I feel the movement, I feel the hope to rise, but I'm sure of nothing! #Lille # FH2012

192322386748637185.text: Every six months, if I have the mandate, I will report on the activity of the government and my presidency! #Lille # FH2012

192321844899086338.text: I did not need to go out every day with a new proposal. I presented in January my 60 commitments! http://t.co/qmoXwGKD

192321036392464384.text: I want a big tax reform that imposes the same rules on capital income and labor income! #Lille # FH2012

192320833035833344.text: There will be no effort if it is not shared. #Lille # FH2012

192320297276416000.text: I call you to this change for work, for employment, for human dignity, for the recovery of France, for Europe!

192319602003415041.text: Why would not Europe make youth a great cause for the years to come, too ?! #Lille # FH2012

192318760592490496.text: An election campaign is useful: it allows the incumbent to know what he did not do! #Lille # FH2012

192317730899247104.text: Today I am proud to bring together those who split yesterday: the "yes and the no"! #Europe #Lille # FH2012

192317286533705728.text: I am European. All my political commitments have been guided by the desire to build a Europe of solidarity and progress. #Lille

192317166488522752.text: To change logic is to invest in education, in knowledge, in research, in knowledge! #Lille # FH2012

192316879149338624.text: To change logic is to invest in green growth and renewable energies! #Lille # FH2012

192316740192055297.text: To change the logic is to engage a large industrial policy for our large sectors in the medium and long term. #Lille # FH2012

192316339422117890.text: To change logic is to end a system where money is used for speculation and not for production! #Lille # FH2012

192316043664957441.text: That's why I will make the generation contract! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Lille # FH2012

192315869177712640.text: To change logic is to end with unemployment that strikes the youngest and condemns the oldest! #Lille # FH2012

192315692211650561.text: To change logic is to put an end to state aid to companies without any counterpart. #Lille # FH2012

192315457028636673.text: We can not imagine a different policy with the same President! #Lille # FH2012

192315308596408320.text: We arrive, we will be there and we will give industrial prospects to France! #Lille # FH2012

192314964193705985.text: I do not want a France without a factory, or factories without workers! #Lille # FH2012

192314831561428992.text: So many generations have mobilized for great causes. Our goal is to enable progress, equality and justice!

192314465717452800.text: Our fight is not exhausted! #Lille # FH2012

192314257105367040.text: I respect the unions. To attack the unions is ultimately to attack the workers! #Lille # FH2012

192313467913506816.text: France is not yet rid of poverty, the misery of injustice. It's our fight! #Lille # FH2012

192313328033480704.text: This promise we must honor: our children must live better than us, it's called progress, humanity, it's the French Dream!

192312958901166080.text: It's the fight of those who expect so much from the Republican promise for their children! #Lille # FH2012

192312816823316480.text: The march of history: the struggle of those who live by their work and whose only heritage is called social security #Lille # FH2012

192312523184283648.text: Sunday, France will meet his destiny. The challenge is to continue the long march of history! #Lille # FH2012

192311657232470017.text: "Courage" I am told, but courage, I will have it to the end to bring you to victory! #Lille # FH2012

192311453196357632.text: It is urgent, it is in 5 days that we will decide our destiny! #Lille # FH2012

192311306764824576.text: I expect nothing but victory and then the transformation of our country! #Lille # FH2012

192311180759531520.text: It is immediately that we must win! #Lille # FH2012

192311118008549376.text: There are not two left, there is only one left, who wants to win, who wants to gather the French! #Lille # FH2012

192311036974612481.text: I greet @MartineAubry, first secretary of the PS. Without the PS, there is no change today in France! #Lille # FH2012

192310976421445633.text: I know that Pierre Mauroy hears us, that he is present at our side! #Lille # FH2012

192309942496149506.text: We must join this great movement called French socialism! # FH2012 #Lille

192309573951045632.text: I made the commitment to make the centenary of the "Great War" a great international gathering for peace. # FH2012 #Lille

192309318954131456.text: To find #Lille, for the Socialist candidate that I am, is to find his roots! # FH2012

192309201769472001.text: I knew the heat of the North, I discovered it again with a lot of happiness! #Lille # FH2012

192307040843071488.text: My speech at #Lille is live and it's now! http://t.co/jTmlv5GM # FH2012

192289455351136256.text: Our big gathering at #Lille, with @MartineAubry, it's live, and it's now! http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012

192141815082778625.text: I will restore the initial training of teachers. #RTL # FH2012

192140608125673472.text: I want greater progressivity of the tax so that the tax policy is more fair. #RTL # FH2012

192140172954050560.text: I prefer to debate facing the right than divide the left. The left must come together to embody hope. #RTL # FH2012

192139764219117569.text: We are able to master finance, we are not subject to an order that comes from outside. #RTL # FH2012

192139290334068736.text: I will answer in a few moments to the questions of the listeners of #RTL! # FH2012

192129559192289280.text: I do not want to be the favorite for the presidential election, I want to be the winner! #RTL # FH2012

192128650496319490.text: I call all those who want the change to vote for me from the first round! # 22avril #RTL # FH2012

192128536209924096.text: A presidential election is a gathering, a dynamic. #RTL # FH2012

192128397546229760.text: There will be no bartering, compromise between the two towers. This is not a presidential election. #RTL # FH2012

192128257636827136.text: The SMIC will be indexed to prices and linked to growth. #RTL # FH2012

192128041206550528.text: I am not in the imposed figures. I am a figure who must succeed! #RTL # FH2012

192127528683577346.text: Growth must be at the heart of European negotiations. #RTL # FH2012

192127434039103490.text: The euro crisis is not over yet but France is not exposed, do not let it be believed that it will be attacked. #RTL # FH2012

192002105786105856.text: I invite you to listen tomorrow #RTL morning of which I will be the guest from 7:40. # FH2012

191983424137994240.text: Find here the speech I gave tonight at #Carmaux: http://t.co/sRLga3xf # FH2012

191952336439099392.text: I thank @DamidotValerie for his support! http://t.co/Ak5TWSCJ # FH2012

191943411979390978.text: Thank you for inviting me here to #Carmaux, for having welcomed me, thank you for taking cold to have warmer tomorrow! # FH2012

191942998177759232.text: I am here in the mission that is mine: to do once again, the left meets France! #Carmaux # FH2012

191942438787616768.text: The role of a President is not to divide but to unite, to gather, to reconcile France! #Carmaux # FH2012

191942313390510080.text: I refuse the division of France. There is only France, there is only one country. #Carmaux # FH2012

191942078203305984.text: I wanted to mark this campaign with the seal of constancy. I did not change my project based on moods and moods. #Carmaux

191941468003385344.text: It is because I do not want the Europe of austerity that I will renegotiate the European treaty. #Carmaux # FH2012

191941343512231936.text: We will treat them with dignity, we Spaniards will treat them as friends. #Carmaux # FH2012

191940881585152000.text: The last threat to us is that which the incumbent has brandished: fear. #Carmaux # FH2012

191940572146184192.text: I do not claim a useful vote, but the winning vote, the vote of victory! #Carmaux # FH2012

191940327123320832.text: My message is simple: those who want change must vote for change in the first round! #Carmaux # FH2012

191939421858312192.text: The temptation of the far right threatens us too. #Carmaux # FH2012

191939287367942144.text: What threatens us is first and foremost abstention. An abstention not of indifference but of rupture. #Carmaux # FH2012

191939068274278402.text: I feel this hope that asserts itself, the hope of change! #Carmaux # FH2012

191938655768678402.text: An omnipresident is a helpless President, we know it today! #Carmaux # FH2012

191938505654550528.text: We will not change France if only the State decides! #Carmaux # FH2012

191938303900139520.text: I am a normal candidate to be a normal President! #Carmaux # FH2012

191938088841379840.text: I want that around my candidacy, there is a hope of a better future. #Carmaux # FH2012

191937892556357633.text: I have the feeling, by dint of moving, that a confidence is being born! #Carmaux # FH2012

191937432428617728.text: We will not waste time. I did not hide anything, nothing hidden! #Camaux # FH2012

191937215591481344.text: I have indicated the first steps that I will have to take: http://t.co/zuUShNgL #Carmaux # FH2012

191936517554442240.text: The priority of my quinquennium will be the youth through the National Education, the fight against school failure, training! #Carmaux

191935992989630465.text: Consistency requires making commitments in a campaign. I did it last January! http://t.co/qmoXwGKD #Carmaux # FH2012

191935292742184961.text: Today I claim the synthesis of Jaurès, between the ideal that we must serve and the reality that is before us! #Carmaux # FH2012

191935088064331776.text: The challenges of the world described by Jaurès are still ours: peace, education, secularism, social rights. #Carmaux # FH2012

191934550044184577.text: Today, did he once mention Jean Jaurès? He can not! #Carmaux # FH2012

191934451129909248.text: In 2007, Nicolas Sarkozy, Toulouse, then candidate, had cited 32 times the name of Jean Jaurès! So that was his reference! #Carmaux # 2012

191933898073186307.text: More than 31 years ago, François Mitterrand came here to launch his presidential campaign! #Carmaux # FH2012

191933853168963584.text: I measure the responsibility you entrusted to me! #Carmaux # FH2012

191932378132922369.text: Follow live now our gathering at #Carmaux: http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012

191912023276269568.text: In exclusivity, here is the video of my door-to-door with @Anne_Hidalgo last saturday in Paris: http://t.co/P9AZ9oDt #PAP # FH2012

191885889071349761.text: I answered Allociné's questions about my favorite movies: http://t.co/Yzi5EAZl # FH2012

191843854452916224.text: While I am today in the Tarn, I gave an interview to the Dépêche du Midi: http://t.co/pgmeSZMg # FH2012

191788063922458624.text: The higher I will be in the first round, the easier will be the gathering: http://t.co/zN5vylbV #FranceInfo # FH2012

191595568341057538.text: My team followed me during the 5 minutes before my entry on stage this afternoon at #Vincennes: http://t.co/z1TNCfsq # FH2012

191549048518492161.text: Find here the full speech I made this afternoon at #Vincennes: http://t.co/N2w2J24A # FH2012

191535149228359680.text: The victory is next Sunday, with you all! #Vincennes # FH2012

191535004659097600.text: Give me, on April 22, the strength to lead you to victory on May 6! #Vincennes # FH2012

191534709677899776.text: We waited too long: 10 years in the opposition! We have the duty of victory! #Vincennes # FH2012

191534416693166080.text: A vote is a vote. What matters is not being the richest, nor the powerful, what matters is to be the most numerous! #Vincennes

191533912491696128.text: Today, I'm not asking you to help me, I'm asking you to help France! #Vincennes # FH2012

191533826311327744.text: To be President of the Republic is to reunite the nation around a cause. This cause, I called it the French Dream! #Vincennes # FH2012

191533485037596672.text: I will be the President of justice: before any decision, I will ask myself one question: is it fair? #Vincennes # FH2012

191533114227572736.text: I will be the president of the coherence with a course that I will hold: recovery and redistribution! #Vincennes # FH2012

191532580053594112.text: I will be the president of a Republic that will be stronger than the markets, a France that will be more powerful than finance! #Vincennes

191532431180955649.text: I am ready to preside over France! #Vincennes # FH2012

191532083175374851.text: The greatness of History will be to prolong together the march towards progress, towards conquests, towards pride! #Vincennes # FH2012

191531331509960704.text: France will always be present where it is a question of fighting for democracy! #Vincennes # FH2012

191531109748703232.text: If I am tomorrow the President, there will be a renegotiation of the treaty. Austerity will not be the only rule! #Europe #Vincennes # FH2012

191530344577642496.text: The hospital will again be considered a public service and not a business! #Vincennes # FH2012

191529787276271618.text: France is not bankrupt, even if it is its leaders who have failed! #Vincennes # FH2012

191529294781104128.text: It is a general mobilization that will have to be decreed, as in other periods of our History! #Vincennes # FH2012

191528730672381952.text: No child of the Republic will be forgotten, abandoned, abandoned. This is the commitment I take before you! #Vincennes # FH2012

191528525084364800.text: The challenge of this election is France and first the youth, who must regain confidence in her, find her place in the Republic!

191528134951174144.text: I call you to give a harsh judgment on the quinquennium that is coming to an end! #Vincennes # FH2012

191527882806394881.text: My compatriots, it is necessary to come to vote, to vote for yourself, to vote for the Republic, to vote for France. #Vincennes # FH2012

191527773548974080.text: I said it and I repeat it in front of you: I'm ready, ready to represent you in the 2nd round, ready to win May 6th and ready to preside over France!

191526394512146432.text: This majority will not be silent, it will be bold, it will be great, the great majority of the change! #Vincennes # FH2012

191526142010855424.text: There is not on one side a noisy minority and on the other a silent majority! #Vincennes # FH2012

191526024989782016.text: I reject this pernicious way of setting half of France against the other. #Vincennes # FH2012

191525805996781568.text: To call for fear is already to retreat! #Vincennes # FH2012

191525732487401472.text: Calling speculation for help to prevent alternation It will not succeed because it is the French people, free and sovereign who decides!

191524879923810304.text: A calm, firm, lucid hope, the hope of a start, the hope of justice, the hope of the youth of France! #Vincennes

191523921915424769.text: I want to tell you my confidence, I feel a great hope, a hope of the depths of our country! #Vincennes # FH2012

191523766470311936.text: It is an exceptional choice, in an exceptional moment, to designate who will lead France. #Vincennes # FH2012

191523463431856128.text: The moment is approaching, the French will determine their destiny. #Vincennes

191523119004008448.text: I hear the clamor, I measure the fervor, I imagine tomorrow the happiness that could be ours if we reach the victory! #Vincennes

191516265691615232.text: More than 100,000 people gather at #Vincennes for our big gathering! An event to follow live on http://t.co/EaXM2v7g

191487162154352640.text: Live all of our big gathering today at #Vincennes live on my campaign site! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012

191449143758168064.text: Before we meet at 12:30 in #VIncennes, I suggest you read my interview in the Journal du Dimanche: http://t.co/l4B7qPTu # FH2012

191253787481092097.text: See you tomorrow, from 12:30 pm, on the esplanade of the castle of Vincennes, for a big festive and popular gathering! http://t.co/N2w2J24A

190871795375681537.text: Follow me live now with my Mediapart editorial team on my campaign site: http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012

190841823386808320.text: Until the end of my strength, I will continue this campaign, nothing will stop me! #Chelles # FH2012

190841676976238592.text: It is we who will put order in the house France! #Chelles # FH2012

190841586953883649.text: I do not know any appearance, I consider only belonging to the Republic, bigger than anything! #Chelles # FH2012

190840891383087104.text: We have no lesson to receive from him who, when he speaks of a woman or a man, first looks at his appearance! #Chelles # FH2012

190840611597852672.text: We will not let ourselves be taught by the incumbent! #Chelles # FH2012

190839091871494145.text: The left will not fall into the trap, it will be gathered from the evening of the first round! #Chelles # FH2012

190838966495363072.text: The movement we are going to engage is that of victory! #Chelles # FH2012

190345755465228290.text: My speech, last night, during the broadcast of France 2 "Words and deeds": http://t.co/wNOei8uC #DPDA #TousHollande

190170855534379008.text: Le Figaro makes a day every day that is not favorable to me. It's his right! I will always fight for freedom! #AllHollande #DPDA

190170567956119553.text: If I become the next head of state, I will not be the leader of the majority or the leader of the Socialist Party. #AllHollande #DPDA

190170316507582464.text: If I am elected, it is my project that will be applied, there will be no doubt. #AllHollande #DPDA

190169591660552192.text: In the next five years there will be no accession of Turkey to the Union. The conditions are not met. #AllHollande #DPDA

190169305177001984.text: The presidential stature is acquired when you become President of the Republic. Sympathy is less about! #AllHollande #DPDA

190168843275091968.text: Me, I'm not a candidate "pocket-surprise", I have a cap, I'm not in the zig-zag! #AllHollande #DPDA

190168589922344960.text: The ISF will not be multiplied by three, since I will return to the scale lightened by Nicolas Sarkozy. #AllHollande #DPDA

190167950148386817.text: We must renegotiate the treaty to complete it with a growth device! #Europe #AllHollande #DPDA

190167803695874048.text: The treaty only provides disciplines and sanctions that would introduce austerity for years. #Europe #AllHollande #DPDA

190167166350409728.text: The role of a politician is to dominate the markets. #AllHollande #DPDA

190166642087563265.text: The role of a politician is not to play with speculation. #AllHollande #DPDA

190166470062387202.text: I understood that some used a crisis in the euro area to criticize the alternation! #AllHollande #DPDA

190165689632423937.text: My duty is to restore the country, in justice. #AllHollande #DPDA

190165625627344896.text: These reforms are not flag bearers. They are made to be effective and fair. #AllHollande #DPDA

190165534988443649.text: Making a new step in decentralization is also a major structural reform. #AllHollande #DPDA

190165236924416000.text: A tax reform of magnitude is not a structural reform? #AllHollande #DPDA

190165097925197824.text: Thank you for reading my proposals, presented more than 3 months ago! #AllHollande #DPDA

189785838438191106.text: This movement will not stop: if April 22 we are strong, May 6 we will be victorious for the Republic and for France!

189785592115101696.text: In 12 days, I ask you only one vote: the vote of victory! # Besancon # FH2012

189784885748178944.text: We have a mission: to make the left meet France to change its future! # Besancon # FH2012

189784673147297792.text: The best event, the best strike, the best mobilization is the right to vote! # Besancon # FH2012

189784020089970688.text: We had said the candidate-outgoing "bling-bling", he is especially zig-zag! # Besancon # FH2012

189783453586305024.text: I am not a candidate against the incumbent, I am a candidate for France, for hope, for change! # Besancon # FH2012

189783118004228097.text: This election is decisive for our country, decisive for Europe: we are observed! # Besancon # FH2012

189782439567163392.text: Europe as it is today has forgotten to protect the citizens, and to protect itself. # Besancon # FH2012

189781136480800768.text: I am a socialist and I feel ecologist! # Besancon # FH2012

189780776743731200.text: I can not admit that at the beginning of the school, already, the determinism and the fatalities make that certain young people are already "condemned".

189780631025238016.text: I do not accept that 150,000 young people leave our school without qualification. # Besancon # FH2012

189780378297446402.text: We will not make new laws, we will enforce our laws. I think about equal pay for men and women. # Besancon # Equality # FH2012

189780199695581184.text: We must fight against all discrimination and against all inequalities. # Besancon # FH2012

189779825886633984.text: The higher one is in the exercise of the responsibility, even more exemplary one must be in his remunerations and in his behaviors.

189779454946574337.text: I appeal to patriotism because it is the most beautiful idea that we can promote in the Republic! # Besancon # FH2012

189778824320393216.text: I do not want markets to decide for us! # Besancon # FH2012

189777933924188162.text: The incumbent invents a trip to Fukushima that he has never made! # Besancon # FH2012

189776898585407488.text: We will do tax reform with one goal: justice, which will tax labor and capital income in the same way.

189776495852527616.text: The outgoing candidate has created 41 taxes in 5 years! # Besancon # FH2012

189776348552765441.text: I will not accept any lesson from a President who has such a heavy record for the country. # Besancon # FH2012

189773483050409984.text: You, be ready to make the choice of change on April 22! # Besancon # FH2012

189773271787515904.text: I have a duty: not to disappoint, to promise nothing that I could not hold. # Besancon # FH2012

189772970267377664.text: We will revise our institutions to modernize and democratize them. # Besancon # FH2012

188680543653740544.text: Do you have the will to change? So I tell you, the change is coming, it is before us! #Aulnay # FH2012

188680066442592256.text: Scare those who use you: you are not a threat, you are a chance for France! #Aulnay # FH2012

188679952030375936.text: I send you this call for mass lifting, as we said during the French Revolution! #Aulnay # FH2012

188679639458267138.text: Be proud when the Republic is on your side! #Aulnay # FH2012

188679572924006403.text: Be proud of who you are, in your diversity and in your unit! #Aulnay # FH2012

188679159957041152.text: It is you the force, it is you the country, it is you the suffrage: do not let others decide your future! #Aulnay # FH2012

188678863231000576.text: It is because I am of the left that I am aware that I must win this election but also that I must afterwards change the country!

188677718341189632.text: Wherever there is a hospital there will be an IVG center. #Aulnay # FH2012

188677578096246785.text: I will fight not against the identity checks that are necessary but against the facies checks that are unacceptable #Aulnay

188677397808291841.text: I will make sure that each of my compatriots are respected and not suspected! #Aulnay # FH2012

188677097449979904.text: The Republic will have to uphold the principle of equality. #Aulnay # FH2012

188676693265887233.text: I want to be the President of respect and justice! #Aulnay # FH2012

188676437501427713.text: Jeunesse de France, it's up to you to take power! #Aulnay # FH2012

188676074513764353.text: We will make employment and training the priority of government action. #Aulnay # FH2012

188675243236265984.text: We will create the study grant under resource conditions. #Aulnay # FH2012

188674500110458881.text: I want children in all parts of France to have all the conditions for fulfilling their destiny. #Aulnay # FH2012

188674323005972482.text: Youth of France, have big dreams, push the walls: no border will be asked to your own success. #Aulnay # FH2012

188673971657506817.text: The price of transport will be modulated according to the income and not simply according to the distance! #Aulnay # FH2012

188673556266221569.text: Every young person can have a system of joint guarantee so that the precariousness of work does not add to the precariousness of the residence #Aulnay

188672851157585920.text: The republican promise that I address to you is to offer a dwelling worthy to each one. #Aulnay # FH2012

188670402132836352.text: I visited these cities that are called the suburbs and which are simply France, France who wants to live with dignity! #Aulnay # FH2012

188579805921427456.text: At the end of our round table with #Ulis women, I responded to the press: http://t.co/JvyKTvfR # FH2012

188564035657146368.text: I thank all the women who came to talk this morning to #Ulis. You give a very beautiful image of women and your commitments

188562964796809217.text: We will strengthen the means of judicial protection of youth. #Ulis # FH2012

188562686349553664.text: Each sentence, each sanction must be executed, to avoid impunity. #Ulis # FH2012

188562095531495425.text: The education of fathers is indispensable: one does not become a father because one is a man. #Ulis # FH2012

188560178021543936.text: I think that a single President, even supported by a majority, can not succeed alone. We must have a national effort. #Associations #Ulis

188559861796188160.text: If the associations were not present and if there were no dedicated elected officials, we would have experienced new explosions. #Ulis # FH2012

188558907235508225.text: In the negotiations we will open on pensions, we will have to have a "woman" dimension in our discussions. #Ulis # FH2012

188558345991487489.text: We need to strengthen all integration schemes, especially for the long-term unemployed. #Ulis # FH2012

188557467750379522.text: We will create a parity government where women will have real responsibilities with important ministries. #Ulis # FH2012

188557014283202560.text: Parties that do not present as many women as men in the legislative will no longer have any endowment of the state. #Ulis # FH2012

188555364537602048.text: A right is not only proclaimed, it must be applied: each hospital center must have an IVG center. #Ulis # FH2012

188555098526453760.text: I propose the package "minor contraception": we will give the possibility for free and anonymously to be followed by a doctor. #Ulis

188554709878059008.text: We must allow women who are victims of domestic violence to stay in their homes. #Ulis # FH2012

188554333154066433.text: Sex education, provided by law, must be a real obligation. #Ulis # FH2012

188552502361333760.text: Every time we help the parents, we help the children. #Ulis # FH2012

188550711762624512.text: We will create the jobs of the future and we will set up closing doors for public markets. #Ulis # FH2012

188550273868906496.text: I want to emphasize the extent of school drop-out: I have laid down the principle that every young person between the ages of 16 and 18 must be accompanied. #Ulis # FH2012

188549825493614592.text: We will break the glass ceiling by enforcing the rules of equal pay between men and women under penalty of sanctions. #Ulis # FH2012

188231949033291776.text: Together, we will build another future for our country! #Vaulx # FH2012

188231682971803648.text: When I see the candidate-outgoing boast, I say to myself: let's fight, nothing is done, nothing is acquired, nothing is won! #Vaulx # FH2012

188230400122953728.text: To attack the unions is to attack the employees! #Vaulx # FH2012

188230223207202816.text: We have known the tax hype: this is what we have known for 5 years, unless you are rich! #Vaulx # FH2012

188229850518126592.text: Do not allow suffrage to the far right: more stigma, contempt, divisions. #Vaulx # FH2012

188229523437928448.text: I feel great joy to lead this campaign! #Vaulx # FH2012

188229049653538816.text: I call you to vote massively on April 22! #Vaulx # FH2012

188228829473542144.text: There are no appearances in the Republic, only membership of the national community. #Vaulx # FH2012

188228283765243905.text: In each public market there will be a close integration to hire neighborhood youth! #Vaulx # FH2012

188228014277005313.text: I will create the generation contract that will allow the link in employment between young people and seniors. http://t.co/OkasjwEw #Vaulx # FH2012

188227472557477888.text: You young people do not lose confidence, we come! #Vaulx # FH2012

188227063755440129.text: I trust, all confidence, in the districts of the Republic! #Vaulx http://t.co/hFdPpZj5

188220158899269632.text: Politics must allow everyone to have confidence, to have a relationship with the future that is that of hope # FH2012

188218182220255232.text: We must have a financing system that accompanies business creation. It will be the public investment bank.

188218087064088576.text: I propose that each high school in France can have a number of students who have access to preparatory classes. # FH2012

188216729191723009.text: Without a strong commitment to education, we will be living even harder than we have lived in our neighborhoods.

187971489184755712.text: On April 22, we will have definitively erased the specter of April 21, 2002! # Nimes # FH2012

187970708196950016.text: What honors a nation is that it is able to offer the next generation a better life. # Nimes # FH2012

187969206606757888.text: It is you who must bring the hope to build the France we want! # Nîmes # FH2012 http://t.co/7D7Aldd0

187878315607080960.text: The mission you entrusted to me, the duty that is mine is to win the left and advance France! #Narbonne # FH2012

187876113861713920.text: We demand the exercise of responsibility to transform France sustainably! #Narbonne # FH2012

187876061294493696.text: The left should not just win, move the country forward and then leave ... #Narbonne # FH2012

187873623950897153.text: By duty to the French, I wanted to explain the first months of my mandate http://t.co/zuUShNgL #Narbonne # FH2012

187872304225714176.text: My approach is one of consistency and consistency. #Narbonne # FH2012

187870090514014209.text: There is no balance sheet assumed but there is a hidden project. #Narbonne # FH2012

187869591832236034.text: If you meet people who do not want to pay a VAT increase in October, tell them to vote for us! #Narbonne # FH2012

187868909821632512.text: The candidate-outgoing project? It's his record, but worse! #Narbonne # FH2012

187868593743085568.text: When I say that I want to be Head of State, I add that I do not want to be head of everything, I leave this to others! #Narbonne # FH2012

187868089713569792.text: We have to raise France, to raise the ambitions we carry, to raise the debate! #Narbonne # FH2012

187867832623693824.text: I only have one opponent: the right! #Narbonne # FH2012
