187641638422716417.text: The whole of my speech tonight at #Rennes can be found here: http://t.co/3hHg9HC3 # FH2012

187632068744851458.text: We do not have an enemy on the left, our only opponent is the right, it's conservatism! #Rennes # FH2012

187631233457602560.text: Continue, give me strength, let me win! #Rennes # FH2012 http://t.co/eSU8r5Js

187630642228510723.text: I wanted to join in the 2nd hall of the exhibition park of #Rennes all those who could not enter the 1st! http://t.co/BPJ0cPHh

187621555512147968.text: Vote for victory, long live Brittany, and long live France! #Rennes # FH2012

187621268080705536.text: I call you to victory! We must go and look for her throughout the next few days! #Rennes # FH2012

187619746827616258.text: My promise to you here at #Rennes is to give all my strength, all my energy to live up to your expectations. # FH2012

187619341854969857.text: I have the passion of the general interest, I have the love of my country. #Rennes # FH2012

187618261884604416.text: Democracy is stronger than markets. The Republic is more powerful than finance. France is bigger than speculation.

187617974386040832.text: Before May 6, there is April 22! I call on the French to vote massively in the first round for change! #Rennes # FH2012

187617464799076354.text: There will be two major acts: a new act of decentralization, and the act of ecological transition, energetic. #Rennes # FH2012

187617079497723905.text: We will share the gains of the growth, of the found activity. #Rennes # FH2012

187616815277555712.text: We will ratify the Charter of Regional Languages! #Rennes # FH2012

187616012311609344.text: We have made the commitment of the right to vote of foreigners in local elections! #Rennes # FH2012

187615776503627777.text: The Court of Justice of the Republic will be abolished so that ministers are judged as citizens, because they are citizens!

187615394960379904.text: I will not make a new law. We must apply the laws of the Republic! #Security #Rennes # FH2012

187614954508132355.text: We will impose equal pay between women and men. #Rennes # FH2012

187614905694814209.text: We will introduce a social rating agency. An agency to note good behavior for larger companies. #Rennes

187612288814022656.text: The next President will have one priority: youth! #Rennes # FH2012

187611918926745600.text: Solidarity is not the problem but the solution for Europe! #Rennes # FH2012

187611049099399168.text: I will announce at the NATO summit next May the withdrawal of French troops from Afghanistan. #Rennes #Agendaduchangement # FH2012

187610427629383680.text: A team that will be composed of as many women as men! #Government #Rennes # FH2012

187610172968009729.text: My first decision will be to compose a government, with a Prime Minister who will not be a collaborator but the leader of a team!

187609880071380992.text: The change will begin right away. #Rennes # FH2012

187609814791225344.text: We must be ready to act, to change, to give confidence, and I tell you tonight at #Rennes, we are ready! # FH2012

187608875430711297.text: Consistency is the condition of trust! #Rennes # FH2012

187608795545993217.text: My message is simple: we must change the future, change the policy, change the President. #Rennes # FH2012

187608434538065920.text: I want to be the President of the recovery, the justice, the gathering, the youth of France. #Rennes # FH2012

187608357790683137.text: With you, with millions of women and men, we are fighting for our future to be different from our present. #Rennes # FH2012

187607884094390272.text: Here is the candidate of the people ... supported by the French employers! #Rennes # FH2012

187607816595456002.text: The incumbent says he has changed. He has not changed his project or personality, and he will not change his behavior. #Rennes

187607379221823488.text: His hidden project is the attack on the unions: these "troublemakers", these "impediments", these "bearers of placards". #Rennes # FH2012

187606830187421697.text: This European treaty renounces growth, employment, the very idea that Europe could be a project of prosperity. #Rennes # FH2012

187606225091952641.text: His project is the dismantling of labor law. #Rennes # FH2012

187606040928456704.text: His project is his record, worse! #Rennes # FH2012

187605967821742080.text: He would prepare a measure on the driving license. That's good because the state driving license, the French are soon to take him away!

187605598064488448.text: The incumbent claims that he has changed, that he is another President, that he has learned, that he understands ... #Rennes # FH2012

187604287227052032.text: We have 18 days to convince, to say that tomorrow we can not just win, but succeed for France! #Rennes # FH2012

187604124274130944.text: No candidate starts from nothing, he is the heir of a long history and mine is that of all the left. #Rennes # FH2012

187603838595891200.text: It's a great and beautiful meeting tonight at #Rennes because @RoyalSegolene is here, the one who was our candidate in 2007. # FH2012

187200502579204098.text: France has an appointment with history. History will do it with victory! #Weight # FH2012

187199994300866560.text: Continue the change process to the end! Consider that no vote is acquired until it has been pronounced. #Weight # FH2012

187198293024059392.text: The fight I am waging on your behalf today is the fight of my life. #Weight # FH2012

187197928891363328.text: The police force has decreased in the last five years! #Weight # FH2012

187197771160363009.text: Expulsions of Islamist preachers are announced. Why now? Why not before? Do not be impressed! #Blois

187197004496125952.text: The next President of the Republic must be the guarantor of secularism. #Weight # FH2012

187196615331807232.text: The left is not just a refusal, a rejection. The left is a hope in trust, justice, respect. #Weight # FH2012

187196031216259073.text: Young people are looking for a qualification, a job, a dignity and not a credit! #Weight # FH2012

187194945721995264.text: Justice: this is what has been lacking for 5 years when all decisions were taken against this republican ideal! #Weight # FH2012

187194425334710273.text: I will not abandon any child from France! #Weight # FH2012

187194360494948353.text: The moralization of political life must be a demand on the part of the next head of state. #Weight # FH2012

187194276390780928.text: To be a head of state is to be able to give direction and to respect the powers. #Weight # FH2012

187194143234203650.text: To be head of state is not to be leader of party, clan, caste. #Weight # FH2012

187193809740894210.text: The role of a leader is not to be head of everything but to be head of state. #Weight # FH2012

187193459759775744.text: We need confidence. This beautiful word of "confidence" that allows to give meaning to politics. #Weight # FH2012

187193189881491458.text: France must be united in this difficult moment. I will be tomorrow the President who will gather the French. #Weight # FH2012

187192575864750080.text: As I said at #Tours this morning, I'm seriously left, but for a serious left! #Weight # FH2012

187192422047039488.text: We must show that we can dominate the forces of finance! This is the challenge of this campaign. #Weight # FH2012

187192034640146434.text: Let's be simple: the confrontation is between left and right! #Weight # FH2012

187191682519941120.text: It is in the last days of a presidential campaign that the future of the nation is determined. #Weight # FH2012

187190850512633857.text: It's the first Sunday that counts! # 22avril #White # FH2012

187190036876378113.text: I ask you to allow alternation in France! #Weight # FH2012

187142799672606720.text: We have, again, rendezvous with victory! #Tours # FH2012

187141391086911490.text: We will have to be bold! #Tours # FH2012

187141319917969409.text: We must give hope to our country. #Tours # FH2012

187141168683950080.text: We will make a new reform so that no individual can come to disturb the transparency of the financing of the policy. #Tours

187141002887307265.text: I want to say to the French that change is also in practices and methods. #Tours # FH2012

187140569536008192.text: We need respect and exemplarity. #Tours # FH2012

187140380016394240.text: I will be the President of Justice restored. #Tours # FH2012

187140248181018625.text: The hospital will no longer be considered as a company but as a public service! #Tours # FH2012

187140113778737152.text: Everything will be done for youth employment. #Tours # FH2012

187139707078057985.text: We need an ultimate goal: we must put the school of the Republic at the heart of our commitments. #Tours # FH2012

187139612379062274.text: We have assets, we can succeed! #Tours # FH2012

187139348788031488.text: I never considered that the pastor or the priest could have an authority superior to that of the schoolmaster. #Tours # FH2012

187138089104326657.text: I claim to be the head of state, not to be head of everything and responsible for anything. #Tours # FH2012

187137458746564609.text: Judge the results, judge the projects and make your choice lucidly! #Tours # FH2012

187135828894556161.text: I believe in the vital forces of our country, in all these associative activists, in all those organizations that devote themselves to others! #Tours

187135304220672001.text: Today, it is the left who asks to take responsibility, after 10 years of right! #Tours # FH2012

187134772152254464.text: I am seriously left, but I am for a serious left! #Tours # FH2012

187134632687452160.text: Democracy must be stronger than markets! #Tours # FH2012

187133860876791808.text: Follow our rally live in front of the #Tours castle! http://t.co/pgyxgi1g # FH2012

186119488582856704.text: It is now 1 year that I am a candidate for the presidential election: http://t.co/HsJQMV1h # FH2012

186048320706314240.text: Marriage, adoption: tonight, in Paris, @najatvb will present my commitments for equal rights at @EgaliteLGBT meeting # FH2012

185746583030218754.text: I wish my best wishes to Michel Rocard.

185450380837134336.text: The full speech I gave tonight in Mont-de-Marsan in the #Landes is to find here: http://t.co/BtI9Qkxs # FH2012

185431862724923392.text: I am a candidate to fully exercise the responsibility of the country. #Lands # FH2012

185431619560161281.text: If we want to change, if the French want to turn the page, I am the only one who, with you, can write the next! #Lands # FH2012

185430195405201408.text: The second act will stimulate investment. We will create a public investment bank. #Lands # FH2012

185430038819241985.text: I must deserve your trust. The first act will be to master finance to put it at the service of our economy. #Lands # FH2012

185429985715171328.text: The challenge of this election is confidence: restore confidence to the French. #Lands # FH2012

185428328491139072.text: I want a France stronger, more just, more confident in its future and in its youth! #Lands # FH2012

185428193602306050.text: France is hope, progress, equality and trust! #Lands # FH2012

185426115945447424.text: The presidential election in France is also a European election. #Lands # FH2012

185423443829866496.text: Only one question is asked: do we want to continue or change? #Lands # FH2012

185421884815454208.text: I came to tell all those who doubt: yes change is possible, it is at hand, it depends only on you. #Lands # FH2012

185421478194450433.text: We do not want to distinguish the French according to their origins, their skin color or their convictions. #Lands # FH2012

185420770279829504.text: I have just announced a news: in 2012 there will be a Socialist President who will succeed François Mitterrand! #Lands # FH2012

185325504855945218.text: My first decision will be to increase the back-to-school allowance by 25%. #Montpellier # FH2012

185323810902388737.text: The justice has missed so much for 5 years! #Montpellier # FH2012

185321530945843200.text: Follow our live public meeting outdoors at #Montpellier: http://t.co/YyopRq3Z # FH2012

185305959701286912.text: "I never thought that alternation would be mechanical", the interview I gave today to the World http://t.co/yPgq0FSI # FH2012

185029054678827008.text: The full speech I gave this afternoon at #Nice can be found here: http://t.co/LxJps5B7 # FH2012

185021326828908545.text: At the end of our rally at #Nice, I answered the questions of the press: http://t.co/Yam9ITbq # FH2012

185006816827158528.text: I want the victory to be decided. She is close, but she is not acquired! #Nice # FH2012

185006549780013056.text: The right can not expect to stay in power unless the French come to doubt themselves. #Nice # FH2012

185006333672689667.text: This campaign must enable us to make change irreversible! #Nice # FH2012

185006236767490048.text: The greatest danger would be to think that we could no longer act. #Nice # FH2012

185005840342859776.text: France may be able to change the direction of Europe. #Nice # FH2012

185005264003547136.text: The right will say "if the left comes back, it will empty the boxes". But it's already done! #Nice # FH2012

185005179387641857.text: The right will use all the fears: the fear of the other, the fear of the future, the fear of the left. #Nice # FH2012

185004762616442880.text: Yes, I'll hold on, to the end! Hold on because I want us to win the presidential election together. #Nice # FH2012

185004272205832194.text: I lead this campaign with tenacity, I have a course and I do not deviate. #Nice # FH2012

185004019998138368.text: To carry out this policy, we will need an impartial state and an independent judiciary. #Nice # FH2012

185003764908953600.text: We will create closed centers to avoid jail, which is often the school of recidivism. #Nice # FH2012

185003534813634560.text: Security is not a value of left or right. Security is an obligation. #Nice # FH2012

185003280030646272.text: Secularism is not an eclipse value. There is no open or positive laïcité there is laïcité. #Nice # FH2012

185003078364311553.text: We can not look at each other in their appearance but in their obviousness: every Frenchman is a citizen of France.

185002823530979328.text: Everyone in the Republic must have the same rights and the same duties. #Nice # FH2012

185002258977665024.text: We will put more Republic in the France of tomorrow. #Nice # FH2012

185002049686093824.text: I will establish a study allowance for young people, with means tests. #Nice # FH2012

185001804654845952.text: We must give all its place to the youth of France, which means that National Education will be a priority. #Nice # FH2012

185001426643202048.text: Our country deserves better than it has today, our country deserves change and hope. #Nice # FH2012

185001219025145857.text: Justice is to make sure to control rents where there is speculation. #Nice # FH2012

185000955153100800.text: Yes, there will be justice, yes there will be a limit to these indecent incomes. #Nice # FH2012

185000841739108352.text: I learn, a few hours ago, that one of the bosses of the CAC 40 has increased by 16 million euros. #Nice # FH2012

185000445327065088.text: We will create a training contract: for a long-term unemployed person, the condition of returning to work is training. #Nice # FH2012

185000210924183552.text: We will create the "generation contract": http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Nice # FH2012

184999916261752832.text: I will not turn away from my goal: recovery, mastering finance and giving priority to production. #Nice # FH2012

184999029673955328.text: We will show that democracy is stronger than markets, that we have a recovery capacity! #Nice # FH2012

184998896135704577.text: There are so many doubts about the capacity of politics, so many fears that it is no longer possible to control our destiny. #Nice # FH2012

184998707790483456.text: That's right, we'll have to change: change the President if we want to change our presidency! #Nice # FH2012

184998584276631552.text: I learn this morning that the outgoing candidate promises to be a different president if he is re-elected. We know the method .. #Nice

184998246903586816.text: But this crisis is that of unbridled capitalism. #Nice # FH2012

184998188447576064.text: The crisis would have fallen like a bad rain, as if it were for nothing. #Nice # FH2012

184997837568876544.text: It would be too simple to think that the incumbent is guilty of nothing while he is responsible for everything. #Nice # FH2012

184997760993476608.text: The right has been in power for 10 years. #Nice # FH2012

184997318339203072.text: Aware of his weaknesses, he wants to hide his balance sheet, as if he had not governed. #Nice # FH2012

184997061438087168.text: It is high time when 80 000 jobs were eliminated in the National Education. #Nice # FH2012

184997001094631424.text: Now the incumbent announces that he will now take care of the School! #Nice # FH2012

184996712031600640.text: The last five years was the five-year period of failure and incoherence. #Nice # FH2012

184996571472072706.text: Do I have the cruelty to recall that the 2007 candidate promised to reduce unemployment to 5%? #Nice # FH2012

184996472041914368.text: I am the candidate for change. #Nice # FH2012

184996431071936513.text: Or do the French want by a choice of conscience and confidence to give change all its success? #Nice # FH2012

184996362495066112.text: Do the French want to continue with the same President, the same policy? #Nice # FH2012

184996213354012672.text: I make the commitment here that the local communities will be respected and that a new act of decentralization will be created. #Nice # FH2012

184995389726928896.text: My speech at the Théâtre de Verdure in Nice is live and it's now! http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012

184981573492420608.text: Follow live our big gathering, at #Nice, right now! http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012

184980438484398081.text: At #Nice where will begin in a few moments, at the theater of greenery, our big gathering! # FH2012 http://t.co/nUIIX8sR

184918556968894464.text: Have you signed the "Call of Spring"? http://t.co/C0HO76jL # FH2012

184712132141649920.text: The summary, in pictures, of my meeting with the employees of Eurotunnel and my visit of the service tunnel: http://t.co/6rcinlmE # FH2012

184691553007190016.text: Nothing should stop the change, nothing should stop the movement that will lead us on May 6 to victory. # FH2012

183589718842277888.text: The outgoing President will be scary, but the biggest risk would be to continue 5 more years! #Ajaccio

183589569848016896.text: The presidential election is always the confrontation between fear and hope. #Ajaccio

183589411261399040.text: Let's take the French to the choice of their destiny. Let's share their hope with them. #Ajaccio

183589038358413312.text: Nothing will stop us from making the change. #Ajaccio

183588961292267521.text: Nothing will be spared: caricatures, personal attacks ... But nothing will reach us. #Ajaccio

183588659797299201.text: We are 1 month away from the first round. This campaign will be difficult, because the reality is this one. #Ajaccio

183588119264772096.text: Solidarity and specificities do not contradict each other! #Ajaccio

183587851819155459.text: Corsica is a considerable asset for France. #Ajaccio

183587766653820928.text: I do not accept school dropout. Here, school enrollment rates are among the lowest. We will accompany these young people. #Ajaccio

183587700325105666.text: I wish to respond to this call of the youth who wants to succeed, who wants to train. #Ajaccio

183587447756697600.text: We will increase the number of social housing thanks to the doubling of the Livret A ceiling. #Ajaccio

183587382916939777.text: We will supervise rents where it is necessary to do so. #Ajaccio

183586760033439745.text: Politics is not an election campaign that would erase a mandate. #Ajaccio

183586678722666497.text: Politics is to bring acts into conformity with words. #Ajaccio

183586340766621696.text: I ask you to spread this message: the policy is not the one that has been conducted for 5 years. #Ajaccio

183586240828932096.text: I know how great the disappointments are, how much our citizens can turn away from voting. #Ajaccio

183585876360704001.text: I denounce the method of promising, announcing, each time with the same words, and unfortunately nothing comes. #Ajaccio

183585492296667137.text: We will prepare, with local elected officials, the new development plan for Corsica. #Ajaccio

183585104281612288.text: We will ratify the charter of regional languages. #Ajaccio

183584655096807425.text: Decentralization will recognize a regulatory power in each region. #Ajaccio

183584487693758464.text: Tomorrow, the day after our victory, I will embark on a new stage of decentralization. #Ajaccio

183584236001955841.text: France is strong in its differences. It is this diversity that makes France! #Ajaccio

183584054296322048.text: We will need all the French to make the change. #Ajaccio

183583612749365250.text: My duty is to continue the path of progress. #Ajaccio

183583155998044163.text: The time of justice has come: tax justice, social justice, educational justice and territorial justice! #Ajaccio

183582726258036738.text: The next President should not be the President of austerity but that of dynamism at the service of our development. #Ajaccio

183581781285539841.text: My role will be to give all its place to the School. #Ajaccio

183581246729879552.text: The Republic is ensuring everyone's right to security. #Ajaccio

183581125392859136.text: The Republic is our common ideal. #Ajaccio

183581079544922113.text: It is the values ​​of the Republic that elevate us. We must drive out this spirit of discord, amalgamation and confusion. #Ajaccio

183580489108561921.text: I am here to deliver a rallying message. #Ajaccio

182916008040857600.text: I want to make France love because I want the Republic to be bigger! #Aurillac

182915957109424128.text: It is by reviving the French dream that we will make France love all its children. #Aurillac

182915833641697281.text: We will open a new path for the youth of France! #Aurillac.

182915618075443200.text: Consciousness, trust and coherence: these are the three words to which I attach my campaign. #Aurillac

182915237543022592.text: Nothing will stop the change coming! #Aurillac

182914938786951168.text: The gathering is a constancy and not a circumstance. #Aurillac

182914772835106817.text: For me, authority presupposes appeasement, firmness calls harmony and responsibility requires unity. #Aurillac

182914598213660673.text: For the last three days, all my actions, all my words, my actions have been guided by the desire to bring the national community together. #Aurillac

182914016832794624.text: What will resume today is the confrontation, the debate. But what has just happened requires us to live up to the challenge.

182913790101307392.text: "French" is the most beautiful word that can be associated with the word "citizen". #Aurillac

182913607380643840.text: No young person in France must think that he is not French if he has citizenship. #Aurillac

182911465735454720.text: I am committed to increasing the number of young people per generation by 100,000 who will be in civic service. #Aurillac

182911315663265792.text: It's a nice idea, civic service. It is a shame to have let him reduced to a few things. #Aurillac

182910671527215104.text: We need to train teachers to transmit the values ​​of the Republic. #Aurillac

182910526467227649.text: We will restore the initial training of teachers. #Aurillac

182910148795305985.text: On the right, they know how to do lessons, but they never learn them! #Aurillac

182909451005730817.text: Nobody must have to answer for its origin, its religion, its color of skin: each one must be citizen of the Republic. #Aurillac

182909218339307521.text: We must face the facts: no one in France should be disrespectful. #Aurillac

182909151549210624.text: Today we must give the Republican machine all its energy. #Aurillac

182908857553649665.text: Secularism is our History but it is also our future. That's why I will put it in our constitution. #Aurillac

182908532180525057.text: I never complain when at the top of the state, secularism is finally proclaimed. But I want secularism without an epithet! #Aurillac

182907962552094720.text: The Republic is security, but it is also secularism. #Aurillac

182907611417550848.text: The means of justice will be strengthened because we need faster justice. #Aurillac

182907354818424832.text: I can not admit that 12,000 police and gendarme positions have been eliminated in the past five years. #Aurillac

182907295745843201.text: I will implement proximity security, provided by police in our neighborhoods. #Aurillac

182906954623094784.text: The Republic will not leave any terrorist in peace, and the Republic will defeat them. France will never let down the guard. #Aurillac

182906892010536960.text: We will learn all the lessons from this tragedy. All conclusions will be put to good use by the Republic. #Aurillac

182905751981932546.text: It is more Republic that will allow us to overcome and to be up to the challenges that we will face. #Aurillac

182905486633472001.text: It is in the name of the values ​​of the Republic, for its values ​​and its values ​​that we will overcome the terrorist threat. #Aurillac

182905276763078657.text: The fight against terrorism is not over. It continues and will continue. #Aurillac

182904861560545281.text: The campaign regains its rights but nothing should be forgotten. This tragedy will permanently mark the spirits. #Aurillac

182904407355166721.text: There is a time for everything: a time to fight and a time to gather. #Aurillac

182904351029858304.text: The terrorist wanted in this electoral period to divide us, and to terrify our national community. He will have failed. #Aurillac

182904110729793537.text: At this moment my thoughts are with each of those broken lives, with families, and with those who are still fighting against death. #Aurillac

182903933377855489.text: This public meeting is the first that I hold after the tragedy of Toulouse and Montauban. #Aurillac

182903890629509120.text: Tonight is not an evening like the others. #Aurillac

181096062545690624.text: As N. Sarkozy can not present a balance sheet, nor a project, it presents a face which is that of the excess. # TF1 # FH2012

181095937668694016.text: His record is his ball and he does not present his project. # TF1 # FH2012

181095849613475842.text: N. Sarkozy is in a fight that is a leap forward. # TF1 # FH2012

180980710235062272.text: Any relaxation in European ambition would be a retreat, a recoil on our nations. #Europe # FH2012

180980367107428352.text: We must convince and we must overcome skepticism. #Europe # FH2012

180979740230950912.text: I believe in friendship between France and Germany. #Europe # FH2012

180979087953768448.text: We will have to move towards an even greater responsibility of the committee in front of the European Parliament. #Europe # FH2012

180416369886638080.text: Those who saw me tonight saw me as I am. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180415031756853248.text: Will come to the government those who accept my project. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180413930567507970.text: If we do not get another direction from the Union, the French will turn away from Europe. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180413861197914112.text: France is European. I want to change the direction of the Union. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180413103220072449.text: If we think that there will never be growth, then the election is only a contest of sacrifices. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180412167688962048.text: We must rekindle the fires of growth, otherwise we will be caught in the dizziness of austerity. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180410132834955264.text: You disorganized the school of the Republic, you weakened the capacities of the National Education. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180409855146856448.text: You have a record, that of your majority for 10 years. You have increased the expenditure, widened the inequalities. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180408510905987074.text: When we are able to raise VAT and lower the ISF, we sign a policy. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180407947476738048.text: There will be a 0.1% increase in social security contributions to fund pensions. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180407429186592768.text: You have increased tax inequality as never before and you would come here to teach me about the sound management of public finances?

180403521437450241.text: I wish to powerfully stimulate renewable energies. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180403386519261185.text: For several months now, I have set the goal of reducing the proportion of nuclear power generation by 25% by 2025. #DPDA

180402031499022336.text: If I am tomorrow President, I will announce to our allies that we will withdraw from Afghanistan by the end of 2012. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180400871941742593.text: I will never influence a magistrate. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180400039561134080.text: The tax treaties will have to be renegotiated with Switzerland, Belgium and Luxembourg. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180397302572253184.text: My proposals not to support the rise in the price of fuels on consumers: http://t.co/Xu6QZ0GE # Holland2012

180396107292098561.text: We will block gas prices for 3 months. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180395595868028928.text: I propose a brigade specialized in the fight against clandestine channels. #Immigration # Holland2012 #DPDA

180395451898544129.text: What I can not tolerate is irregular immigration. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180394821041655808.text: We need foreign students. I will repeal the circular Gueant, which deprives our universities of considerable assets. # Hollande2012

180394726527217664.text: Legal immigration follows rules. Today, 180,000 people legally arrive in France each year. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180394158199017473.text: I will not sacrifice the interests of my country. I will not ratify this treaty unless it is renegotiated. #Europe # Holland2012 #DPDA

180393499567460352.text: The current European treaty organizes austerity if it is not renegotiated. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180391067852607489.text: Only 10% of children under 3 years are welcomed in nursery classes. We will triple that number. It's a question of justice.

180390448056107009.text: The energy transition is to advance renewable energies. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180390047596560384.text: Education, justice and security will be preserved. All other administrations will have an effort to make. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180389928012750849.text: We will stabilize the public service workforce. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180389858441822209.text: I prefer to finance prevention. #Health # Holland2012 #DPDA

180389527435747328.text: There is a price of the medicine that is too high. We will reduce prices, and expenses. #Health # Holland2012 #DPDA

180389123910148096.text: We will have to limit the increase in public spending to 1% per year. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180387225723338752.text: I want a separation between credit banking and speculation banking. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180386327123066880.text: I'm not here to create problems, I'm here to find solutions. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180385761630224384.text: Upon taking office, I will allow those who started working early to leave at age 60. #Retirement # Holland2012 #DPDA

180385234729185280.text: Given my position, I have a duty to do nothing that can brutalize the country. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180385153040924672.text: My goal is to be the next President of the Republic. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180384759472603136.text: The French want another conception of the presidency of the Republic. High, but close and respectful. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180384650420686849.text: What I want is to gather the French. I do not want to pit them against each other, divide them. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180384145703321600.text: To respect the French would be a mistake? # Holland2012 #DPDA

180383394386022400.text: I will restore the wealth tax. #ISF # Holland2012 #DPDA

180383011110535168.text: I considered that my responsibility as possible President was to send a signal, to propose a moral measure. # 75% # Holland2012

180382046097641473.text: I have the courage, I hold good and I will go to the end! # Holland2012 #DPDA

180381990334373889.text: The French can trust them and what I propose to them. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180381592097787904.text: Until the first round, I must make it clear to the French that they will make the choice of their destiny. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180381445058068482.text: I am not the weapon of distrust. I am not a candidate against, I am a candidate for France. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180380961761009665.text: I work and I do not leave my line: consistency, consistency and trust. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180380883856011265.text: I have been a candidate for many months, I am preparing for this meeting. I never thought it would be easy. # Holland2012 #DPDA

180028257750630400.text: Find here my entire speech tonight at #Marseille: http://t.co/L8BuRFIt # FH2012

180011939177570304.text: Let's write together the book of the Republic! #Marseille # FH2012

180011838950490112.text: For years I made a promise: give a successor on the left to François Mitterrand. #Marseille # FH2012

180011731572105216.text: Let's make this appointment a happy rendez-vous for France. #Marseille # FH2012

180011464860508161.text: We have before us the most beautiful appointment: the one we took with the French. #Marseille # FH2012

180011245385166849.text: If we want to create a dynamic and therefore a victory, it is in the first round that we must give the change the necessary force!

180010944070549504.text: Suffrage is the most beautiful of revolts! #Marseille # FH2012

180010813757722624.text: People of France, you can not turn to the extreme right, which denies progress and freedom! #Marseille # FH2012

180010583444291587.text: The polls indicate nothing but intentions. What we need to solicit are votes! #Marseille # FH2012

180010412388003840.text: I want to win, more than for the left, I want to win for France! #Marseille # FH2012

180010195613777920.text: I do not ask for your help, I do not need help, I need the will of the French people to change! #Marseille # FH2012

180010085882404864.text: I will not win alone! #Marseille # FH2012

180009838909210625.text: We have 39 days left before the first round, and every day must be a useful day for our country. #Marseille # FH2012

180009697682784256.text: Victory will depend on our ability to convince our fellow citizens. #Marseille # FH2012

180009275224113152.text: Patriotism is also that of young people who engage in associations. #Marseille # FH2012

180008941936312320.text: We must love our country to serve it well. I believe in patriotism, in the love of his people. #Marseille # FH2012

180008861846089728.text: I also want to say that the plight of the disabled in our country is not acceptable. #Marseille # FH2012

180008801926266883.text: I do not forget the oldest, to whom we owe solidarity and respect. #Marseille # FH2012

180008287037702144.text: Change, I want to bring it to all the French who are living the expensive life. #Marseille # FH2012

180006698839318528.text: Tax exiles have nothing to fear. Nothing to fear from him! #Marseille # FH2012

180006249881022464.text: An incumbent candidate can not have the strength that a new President will have! #Marseille # FH2012

180005227418750976.text: What did the candidate-outgoing for 5 years? #Marseille # FH2012

180003511688368128.text: I announced the creation of 1000 additional police and gendarme positions each year. #Marseille # FH2012

180002193334747138.text: The Republic does not know the areas, only the citizens. #Marseille # FH2012

180002126267826176.text: I will stop the zoning. No more ZEPs and other areas. #Marseille # FH2012

180002001453723648.text: We will set up a support network for lone parents because we also have to help parents to help their own children.

180001849267601408.text: Mastery of the language, at school, will be a priority for me. It's early on that everything is played out. #Marseille # FH2012

180001772104982528.text: The Republic is also a language spoken all over the world. I want all children in France to know this language. # FH2012

180000731938566144.text: The school of the first, of the second, of the third chance, as much as it will be necessary for none to feel relegated. #Marseille # FH2012

180000385933656068.text: I will institute 20 hours of law training per year for those who have graduated from school without a diploma. #Marseille # FH2012

179999837238992898.text: Hope is also training, training throughout life! #Marseille # FH2012

179999697073750016.text: The generational contract is the reconciliation of ages! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Marseille # FH2012

179999341644222464.text: The retirement will be 60 years for those who have worked 41 years! #Marseille # FH2012

179999152099430400.text: The hope I want to give, the confidence I want to give to the French, is also employment. #Marseille # FH2012

179999059451453440.text: I do not want one child of the Republic to be excluded from culture, art, knowledge. #Marseille # FH2012

179998634673315841.text: I prefer to protect the youth of France than the richest in France! #Marseille # FH2012

179998324726829057.text: The outgoing candidate treats youth as assisted. I think young people are a chance for our country! #Marseille # FH2012

179997730444296192.text: The hope of France is its youth. That's why I bring it to the heart of my project! #Marseille # FH2012

179997300398112768.text: I am not the candidate of the double game. #Marseille # FH2012

179997107137163264.text: In 2013, I wish to be the President who will inaugurate the European Capital of Culture here. #Marseille # FH2012

179997013717434368.text: It is here too that insecurity has developed. The law of force will now oppose the force of law. #Marseille # FH2012

179996700495183873.text: This is where you decided to fight and change. I will help you! #Marseille # FH2012

179996601236992000.text: It is here that youth unemployment reaches 40% depending on the neighborhood. #Marseille # FH2012

179996355236864000.text: It is here that 30% of the population lives below the poverty line. #Marseille # FH2012

179994883510124544.text: Thank you for your presence, thank you for your enthusiasm, thank you for your confidence! #Marseille # FH2012

179552428859985920.text: Go get the French, go convince them: it is in the first round that the dynamics is created. #Valence # FH2012

179552385289555968.text: You are the actors of hope. #Valence # FH2012

179552226707111936.text: Remember one thing: nothing is done, nothing is won. Hold on tight! #Valence # FH2012

179552013233823744.text: What matters to me is the vote of the French, of whom I know nothing and to whom we owe everything. #Valence # FH2012

179551865464303616.text: What matters to me is not polls! #Valence # FH2012

179551662606794752.text: Do not be impressed by anything: neither by the surge of means, nor by the procession of images or the accumulation of polls. # FH2012

179550904234676224.text: The right will fight until his last breath. It considers that power is its property, its heritage. #Valence # FH2012

179550141454360576.text: France deserves better than she has for too long. #Valence # FH2012

179549995979120642.text: I have three principles: to speak the truth, to respect my duty of coherence, and to give hope to France. #Valence # FH2012

179549454104399872.text: The time of responsibility has come. #Valence # FH2012

179549373397602304.text: France can not be abused 5 more years. #Valence # FH2012

179548667173273600.text: We want to add an indispensable dimension to the European treaty: growth! #Valence # FH2012

179548147700346882.text: And now he is attacking Schengen! #Valence # FH2012

179547855554494464.text: We had not seen everything: after having made 6 immigration laws in 10 years, now he is attacking the spouses of Frenchmen. #Valence

179546391218110464.text: A five-year term is not an apprenticeship! #Valence # FH2012

179546163572252672.text: We especially learned that he had been a bad President. #Valence # FH2012

179545895765950465.text: I am also told "hold on" but I want! It's you who give me the ability to win France! #Valence # FH2012

179545835820953600.text: I am told "courage", but we have the courage! We have it because we are aware of what is at stake! #Valence # FH2012

179545411743268865.text: There are not many France in the country of France! #Valence # FH2012

179545252808507392.text: I want to protect France by bringing it together, by bringing it together, and not by opposing it. #Valence # FH2012

179545153864863745.text: France must gather on high ideas, and not on fears! #Valence # FH2012

179544920648982530.text: That all the young people of France can say that by the School, it is possible to change one's destiny. #Valence # FH2012

179544715648172032.text: With us, the School will regain confidence because we will give it the essential means to its mission! #Valence # FH2012

179544326349664256.text: I want to change France to give youth the place that must be hers. #Valence # FH2012

179544205033615361.text: Beyond an income of one million euros, there must be a mastery, a decency, a limit. #Valence # FH2012

179543621597536256.text: We carry, and it is my responsibility, the great idea of ​​the alternation, the change that must come if you decide. #Valence # FH2012

179543113013002241.text: Does France want to change destiny by coming together, towards justice and towards youth? #Valence # FH2012

179543009061371904.text: The deadline is approaching, the issue is clear: does France want to continue with the candidate-outgoing the same policy? #Valence # FH2012

179290787211784192.text: I'm not sure. If I had any certainty, I would not campaign, I have a duty of conviction. # France3 # FH2012

179290632639090688.text: The role of a President of the Republic is not to create confusion, it is to create clarity. # France3 # FH2012

179290558831931393.text: I want to have the respect of the French and I have to give them confidence, I have to show them the change # France3 # FH2012

179290421959204864.text: No, it is not done. An election, it deserves, a vote, it is conquered. Nothing is done, nothing is acquired. # France3 # FH2012

179290340929454080.text: If I look at them all, I should consider that this election is already made. # France3 # FH2012

179290291499569152.text: I will not let myself be impressed by any poll. # France3 # FH2012

179285856589324288.text: If Ms. Le Pen does not have them, it is true that it will be a problem, but I can not solve it. # France3 # FH2012

179285795058880513.text: I will not comment. Mrs Le Pen must look for signatures. If she has them, she will be a candidate # France3 # FH2012

179285711961337856.text: At each poll, the Le Pen family had its 500 signatures. There is no reason that this time she does not have them. # France3 # FH2012

178963774294859776.text: I see a little less than 7,000 euros per month. #Capital # FH2012

178963671299538947.text: The difference between left and right is not the increase in taxes but will pay more. #Capital # FH2012

178962884343250945.text: I took, for my project, a growth forecast of 1.7%, identical to that of the government. #Capital # FH2012

178962532210446336.text: The doctor must be paid for his actions, but also for what he will save on social security. #Capital # FH2012

178962238516903936.text: I made a proposal on the family quotient: http://t.co/jNSEjzwD #Capital # FH2012

178962024028577792.text: I propose that the expenditures of all our administrations do not increase by more than 1% each year for 5 years #Capital # FH2012

178961735091372032.text: I want a country that moves, innovates, creates. #Capital # FH2012

178961668313841665.text: All those who invest in the company will have justified tax benefits. #Capital # FH2012

178958740274429952.text: We will create a financial transaction tax across Europe that will deter hedge funds. #Capital # FH2012

178958136835715072.text: I will bring the marginal tax rate of income above 1 million euros per year to 75%: http://t.co/Br0HDhqe #Capital # FH2012

178957489885290496.text: It is unacceptable that funds in Europe continue to speculate against the value of our currency. #Capital # FH2012

178953699354361856.text: I propose 150,000 jobs of the future to facilitate the integration of young people into employment. #Employment #Capital # FH2012

178953471872077825.text: The principle of alternation is a principle that applies to both young people and companies! #Employment #Capital # FH2012

178950739874430976.text: I propose the "generational contract": http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Emploi #Capital # FH2012

178949340755267584.text: If the French give me their confidence, what will be said will be done. And that will be a break! #Capital # FH2012

178948384286179328.text: VAT is the most unfair tax. #Capital # FH2012

178947818076119041.text: I am for the SMIC to be linked to growth. If growth increases by 1 point, the increase in the SMIC will be 0.5 point. #Capital

178947666795966465.text: As of September, the back to school allowance, if the French give me their confidence, will be increased by 25%. #Capital # FH2012

178947212489916416.text: Overtime can not be a solution whereas hiring in the company may be possible. #Capital # FH2012

178941928153423872.text: 150,000 young people leave the school system every year without any qualifications, I want to reduce this figure by half in five years. #Capital

178941459028910080.text: The priorities are education, security and justice. #PublicServices #Capital # FH2012

178941346202128385.text: I will create 60,000 positions in the School in 5 years. #Capital # FH2012

178797908357943297.text: I want to remind you that our armies are the first recruiters of young people from 18 to 25 years old. #Defense # FH2012

178795348926541824.text: It will be up to the President-elect to restore a coherence adapted to this great sovereign function. #Defense # FH2012

178794902459654144.text: I will support the role of SMEs in the field of defense. Their dynamism makes them a valuable technological reservoir. #Defense # FH2012

178793683569737728.text: Rationalization measures will be carried out, without pretense and without artifice. #Defense # FH2012

178793278202847232.text: I want to consolidate our nuclear deterrence. It is the life insurance of our country against the threat of proliferation. #Defense

178792577024262144.text: I also want to mention the Atlantic alliance: it is a guarantee of our security. #Defense # FH2012

178791763778084864.text: I want political alternation in France to be an opportunity for a revival of European defense. #Defense # FH2012

178791574812114944.text: Europe of defense has been so often hoped, it must take a new dimension. #Defense # FH2012

178791277310132225.text: I make the commitment to set a course for our defense strategy. #Defense # FH2012

178603242350063616.text: Find here the full speech I made today on #Outremer: http://t.co/TypN8KcM # FH2012

178566271502254080.text: You must become aware of your strength in the Republic. #Outremer # FH2012

178564967824502788.text: After today's big gathering, I meet the ultramarine Parisian associations. #Outremer # FH2012 http://t.co/9iCtJGDi

178548592485736448.text: I owe you this victory that you have been waiting for so long. A victory for the Republic, a victory for France. # FH2012

178548370594471936.text: April 22 must be a first round that allows us to be as high as possible in the second round. #Outremer # FH2012

178548002636570625.text: It is we who must set the example and straighten the country! #Outremer # FH2012

178547901528682497.text: We must give all the French who are watching us the pride of being at the rendezvous of history. #Outremer # FH2012

178547454067744769.text: I call for the highest possible participation, and I warn of the temptation to anger the extreme vote. #Overseas

178547001699467264.text: Respect the campaign, do not dread anything except polemics, outrages, overbid. #Outremer # FH2012

178546945126711297.text: Do not be afraid, do not be impressed by anything! #Outremer # FH2012

178546494155132928.text: France is a big archipelago! #Outremer # FH2012

178546424429023232.text: I know the #Outremer well, I have friends everywhere, and those who are not my friends do not know me yet! # FH2012

178544525214629889.text: It is justice that summarizes the project I present to the French. #Outremer # FH2012

178543485677346816.text: Credits to finance supported jobs were divided by 10. #Outremer # FH2012

178543398821699584.text: The fight against unemployment, the # 1 scourge of #Outremer: 60% of young people are unemployed. # FH2012

178542552637640704.text: I took 30 commitments for #Outremer, http://t.co/RxvySG4r, in addition to my 60 proposals. # FH2012

178542357761892354.text: At school, local language classes will be offered. #Outremer # FH2012

178542142933835776.text: This city of #Outremer will be a place of expression of cultures. A living place, open to all. # FH2012

178542070183641089.text: 6 weeks of promises will not erase 5 years of inertia. I will relaunch the project of the city of #Outremer in Paris. # FH2012

178541499959607296.text: The interministerial delegation for equal opportunities will become competent to fight against discrimination. #Outremer # FH2012

178541061109587968.text: I commit myself that the prices of the communications between the hexagon and the #Outremer are aligned with those in hexagon. # FH2012

178540577774768128.text: The republican promise is first of all that of equality. This raises the question of territorial continuity. #Outremer # FH2012

178539873794408448.text: Our fight is against inequalities, but also against indignities. #Outremer # FH2012

178539528062111746.text: Slavery is a crime against humanity, an affront to the dignity of every human being. #Outremer # FH2012

178539014771580928.text: This word has taken on a different meaning today. We only know one race, one family, the human family. #Outremer # FH2012

178538936266784768.text: There is no place in the Republic for the race. I will ask Parliament to remove the word race from our Constitution. #Overseas

178538832612954112.text: The Republic does not fear diversity, because diversity is life, movement. Uniformity is forgetting. #Outremer # FH2012

178538693953462272.text: The French Republic is one, indivisible and secular. #Outremer # FH2012

178538431763320833.text: The France I love is the one that is able to make everyone live together. #Outremer # FH2012

178538271054364673.text: France is proud of all its multiplicities, France is proud of its miscegenation. #Outremer # FH2012

178537307975069699.text: I want to greet affectionately @BertrandDelanoe, Mayor of Paris, who is also, Mayor of one of the largest cities of # Outremer! # FH2012

178533923012358145.text: Before I give my speech in a few minutes, here are my commitments for Overseas: http://t.co/u8GaXMoP # FH2012

178503499519229953.text: I am sad to learn of Jean Giraud's disappearance. Draftsman and scriptwriter, he was above all a craftsman of dreams.

178201750602395648.text: I meet the French in Warsaw with @pyleborgn, the socialist candidate for the legislative elections! #Poland # FH2012 http://t.co/TMqz2Ivz

178181119404015616.text: We must restore confidence in the European ideal! #Poland # FH2012

178175503847526400.text: Debate on the future of Europe with former President Kwasniewski, organized by the Polish daily Gazetta Wyborcza. #Poland # FH2012

178167711250128897.text: I wanted to collect myself this afternoon in front of the Warsaw Ghetto memorial. cc @pierremoscovici # Memory #Poland # FH2012

178154496193605634.text: I will plead, I will act for the renegotiation of the European Treaty, the partners know it. I'm not hiding anything. #Poland # FH2012

178154249140711424.text: There is a real European will on my part. #Poland # FH2012

178154011558543360.text: To the press that questions me, I explain that all the European partners are respectful of the vote of the French. #Poland # FH2012

178149906530312194.text: We continue our visit stopping in front of the last stones of a bunker of the Warsaw ghetto. # Memory http://t.co/Fn7bOGXe

178144387136618496.text: I would like to thank the Chief Rabbi of Poland for having me here at the Warsaw Ghetto Memorial. # Memory http://t.co/6E6vYdcF

178127597299974144.text: The treaty lacks a component on growth, the development of major joint projects, financial instruments such as Eurobonds.

178127108793569281.text: I explained to the President that I wanted to renegotiate the European Treaty to add the missing dimension. #Poland # FH2012

178126854132211712.text: I want to involve all European countries in the economic governance of the Union. #Poland # FH2012

178126718920441859.text: I wanted to tell President Komorowski my position on the major European issues. #Poland # FH2012

178082973084692480.text: I arrive in Warsaw where I will meet in a few minutes Bronislaw Komorowski, President of the Polish Republic. #Poland # FH2012

177855178123378690.text: Make with me the choice of change! #Reims # FH2012

177854989652344832.text: We must win for ourselves, for our ideas, but also and especially for the Republic! #Reims # FH2012

177854144344883200.text: France needs Europe, and Europe needs France! #Reims # FH2012

177853814911668225.text: Our first goal is to straighten the country! #Reims # FH2012

177852966466891776.text: It is incredible that the President only learns now that only 10% of the unemployed are trained! #Reims # FH2012

177852408687362048.text: It's your decision that will count! #Reims # FH2012

177852298033238016.text: Nothing would be worse than betting on abstention! #Reims # FH2012

177852032227614721.text: I will defend what was the history of the Republic, and the history of the left. #Reims # FH2012

177851660733923329.text: I assume the balance of the left! #Reims # FH2012

177851452990046208.text: A useful campaign for citizens is a campaign that illuminates and not that aims to impress. #Reims # FH2012

177851342361067522.text: I want the campaign to be useful to France and the French. #Reims # FH2012

177851148445827072.text: We do not wait for the President of states of souls but of service! #Reims # FH2012

177851003717173250.text: What is expected of a President of the Republic is not that he speaks of himself but of the French. #Reims # FH2012

177849843996311552.text: Secularism, enshrined in the constitution, will be a protection for women! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177849606368010241.text: The Republic must be secular! Secularism is our ability to live together! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177849567813959680.text: The Republic must be secular! Secularism is our ability to live together! #Reims 8mars # FH2012

177847782537838592.text: I address myself to all the women of France: I want to tell them my gratitude, my gratitude and my commitment! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177846988795154432.text: To those who tolerate the oppression of women, to all these fundamentalists, I say that France will always fight them. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177846516948541440.text: It is not up to the woman victim to leave her home, but to the violent spouse. We will impose on him the force of the law. #Reims # 8mars

177846396525887489.text: Every two days in our country, a woman dies under the blows of her spouse. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177846113137733633.text: All hospitals in our country must have an IVG center. And I want this act to be 100% refunded. #Reims # 8mars

177845992165617664.text: I will lengthen the paternity leave. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177845558843670528.text: A woman who can not keep her children is not a free woman. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177845482721263616.text: The care of young children must become a real public service. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177844839730249728.text: Women are the first victims of precarious employment. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177844747753357312.text: Political parties that do not respect parity will lose all state grants. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177844520652775424.text: We will enforce respect for parity in parliamentary elections. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177844036802064384.text: If I am elected, contraception for minors will be really confidential. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177843803305148416.text: Then these big companies will lose the benefits of social security contributions on these jobs. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177843650196283394.text: I will give big companies a year to comply with the law. A year and not a day more. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177843577882292224.text: At equal responsibilities, women's pay is 20% lower. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177843503387262977.text: Today the average salary of women is 25% lower than men's wages. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177843089443008512.text: We will recreate a Ministry of Women's Rights. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177842931514880000.text: The boards of directors of public companies will also be joint! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177842809510969344.text: All major instances of the Republic will also be parity. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177842731131994112.text: I will form a joint government. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177842657354190848.text: Equality between women and men is a priority. #Reims

177842349962043392.text: I ask you to resume the walk! #Reims 8mars # FH2012

177842251286855681.text: A story was interrupted, a thread broke. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177842096340860928.text: For feminism and equality, it's time to open a new page! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177841922155622400.text: It's up to all women and men to fight for dignity! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177841881978384385.text: Feminism is not the monopoly of a political party. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177840622428880899.text: It is with daring, courage and will that we will transform our country! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177840226918600705.text: The struggle for the rights of women is the struggle for the humble, the forgotten, the offended. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177839352162959361.text: Feminism is a social fight! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177839271762329601.text: Feminism is a lever of transformation for a society like ours. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012

177839184025894912.text: I want to salute all the elected representatives of France who work to change the lives of the women and men of our country. # 8mars # FH2012

177838859390951424.text: I came to #Reims to greet a woman elected from a city of 100,000 inhabitants, Adeline Hazan! # 8mars # FH2012

177838055032492032.text: Socialists are now gathered, as never in our history. #Reims # FH2012

177752332346466305.text: To read! "Women's rights go by the left" by @NajatVB and @carolinedehaas http://t.co/UNmijVvq # women's day # FH2012

177721838519066624.text: The "minor contraceptive package" will offer free, access to a doctor in anonymity and high-level contraception. # FH2012

177721225664147456.text: Too many girls can not access contraception. # FH2012

177721156240027649.text: There is still too much delay in sexual education and information. # FH2012

177699706804240385.text: But frankly it is, if I may say so, his freedom and that of the French to decide. # FH2012

177699604010250241.text: I understand that the outgoing candidate may be wondering about his withdrawal from politics if he were not re-elected. # FH2012

177480054681501696.text: I will make school my priority. # JT20H # FH2012

177479642536611840.text: Nothing is acquired, nothing is conquered. # JT20H # FH2012

177479493856923648.text: I will be the head of a state, not a party. # JT20H # FH2012

177479310981070849.text: I am not in the exhibition. # JT20H # FH2012

177479219058712576.text: I am not a candidate to talk about myself, I am a candidate to talk about the French and their future. That's the difference # JT20H # FH2012

177479038439391233.text: If I were not ready, I would not be in front of you to talk about France. # JT20H # FH2012

177478904024547329.text: On Syria, the actions that are carried out are in the direction that I wish, there will be continuity. # JT20H # FH2012

177478656946475008.text: I would have taken note of Putin's election, not more. # JT20H # FH2012

177478493385404417.text: Football players, too, must have reason. # JT20H # FH2012

177478288237797376.text: I will be elected not to settle accounts, but problems! # JT20H # FH2012

177478196059578368.text: My first decision will be to withdraw our troops from Afghanistan before the end of 2012. # JT20H # FH2012

177478111586304000.text: On Pôle emploi, it will be necessary to give means so that the pole can succeed its mission. # JT20H # FH2012

177478003394224129.text: We will come back to the judicial map. # JT20H # FH2012

177477516821409792.text: The temptation of N. Sarkozy to make immigration a main theme of the campaign will not pass. # JT20H # FH2012

177477359128166401.text: N. Sarkozy gave a false goal, which will never be achieved. #Immigration # JT20H # FH2012

177477189518893056.text: It is necessary to go much faster on the answers to the right of asylum. # JT20H # FH2012

177477002406789120.text: We must fight against illegal immigration. # JT20H # FH2012

177476621824040962.text: Republic, these are rules! # JT20H # FH2012

177476330185699331.text: No to tax benefits that have benefited the highest patrimonies. # JT20H # FH2012

177476227127455744.text: I can say no: no to crazy finance, no to indecent pay. # JT20H # FH2012

177475622115876864.text: The outgoing candidate has evaded a number of his responsibilities. # JT20H # FH2012

177475502389460992.text: From the outgoing president, I'm waiting for him to present his record rather than his apology. # JT20H # FH2012

177411174168666112.text: Remy Ochlik had the courage to go to Syria at the risk of his life.

177411118225031168.text: I remember the photographer Rémy Ochlik, who followed us in our travels for the presidential campaign.

177393116637179904.text: I will be tonight the guest of the 20 hours newspaper of France 2! # FH2012

177338403191402496.text: Find the highlights of my speech this morning on # Europe1: http://t.co/lkD1GJuf # FH2012

177299506415669249.text: An election is won in the first round. It is the dynamics of the first round that creates the victory. # Europe1 # FH2012

177299204622925824.text: Everyone will understand that the outgoing candidate wants to mobilize the voices of the extreme right for his own candidacy. # Europe1 # FH2012

177298670620901376.text: I have never proposed to delete the family quotient. We will put a ceiling at 2000 euros instead of 2300 euros. # Europe1 # FH2012

177298141144551425.text: We are not going to restore the business tax. # Europe1 # FH2012

177295780309254144.text: I am not in introspection or exhibition. My only goal is to serve France. # Europe1 # FH2012

177295227386736640.text: I found that @LaurentFabius held its place well. He has shown that the outgoing president must be returned to his balance sheet. # Europe1 # FH2012

177292348840095745.text: I hope that the next government will be equal. # Europe1 # FH2012

177291667341185024.text: I conform to what I am, I do not change, I do not need to change. # Europe1 # FH2012

177288739050094592.text: To be President, it should already have been? The argument of experience has no meaning in a democracy. # Europe1 # FH2012

177287907470622720.text: @ anne_roumanoff said something very fair: polls do not make an election. Nothing is played. # Europe1 # FH2012

177287137148940289.text: If you meet these criteria, you are regularized. It's clear. There will be no complacency. # Europe1 # FH2012

177286980995006464.text: 3 recognized criteria for all: work, presence on the territory, and the family criterion. # Europe1 # FH2012

177286687846699008.text: There will be no fixed goal, but the need to have clear criteria. # Europe1 # FH2012

177286399882575872.text: For those who have married a foreign spouse, what will we create as a family if we forbid regularization? # Europe1 # FH2012

177286170525450241.text: Half are students. It is an asset for our country. I will abolish the circular Gueant. # Europe1 # FH2012

177286114606985216.text: 180,000 people come to our territory legally. # Europe1 # FH2012

177285945521995776.text: In 2007, N. Sarkozy promised "chosen immigration". In fact, economic immigration has fallen to 10%. # Europe1 # FH2012

177283406365868032.text: I wish clubs to invest, but I think there is moralisation to be done. #Football # Europe1 # FH2012

177283155429036033.text: I know Football well. I wish Lyon to qualify against Nicosia! # Europe1 # FH2012

177283057877909504.text: The "75%" is not a tax but a marginal tax bracket on income over one million euros per year # Europe1 # FH2012

177279696642383873.text: Good ideas, you must have them at the beginning of your term, not at the end! # Europe1 # FH2012

177279582897045505.text: I will set 3 rates on companies: 15% for small, 30% for medium and 35% for large companies. # Europe1 # FH2012

177279295583035392.text: At the end of his term, N. Sarkozy discovers that large groups escape tax! # Europe1 # FH2012

177278949691363328.text: My favorite oath? I do not have a swear word, but expressions like: "make an account!" # Europe1 # FH2012

177278377043042304.text: Mrs Merkel will have to respect the vote of the French people. # Europe1 # FH2012

177278256813322241.text: My first trip to Europe will be in Germany. I believe in the need for Franco-German friendship. # Europe1 # FH2012

177278023744229377.text: A campaign reveals a number of personalities. # Europe1 # FH2012

177277932459405312.text: The first measure I will take will concern me personally: to reduce by 30% the income of the President and that of the members of the government.

177276692342124544.text: 5 years later, have the decisions been in keeping with the promises? It's up to the French to say it! # Europe1 # FH2012

177276329404809216.text: I believe that the head of state must regularly hold consultations with the opposition. This has not been done. # Europe1 # FH2012

177276119022698496.text: It is better to speak French for 2 good hours rather to talk about yourself for more than 3 hours! # Europe1 # FH2012

177172740653056001.text: I will be at 7 am the guest of the morning of Europe 1! # FH2012

177100318763515907.text: I want to meet you: register to come share a coffee with me on Monday, at the campaign headquarters! http://t.co/q5A2B5w3 # FH2012

177086067516780546.text: If we put all our energy, our unity, and our will, I think that our victory is possible! #AN # FH2012

177085455257448448.text: We are a month and a half from the first round. Nothing is done, nothing is played. #AN # FH2012

177084832843702273.text: I ask you to go door-to-door, to make meetings, to pick up voters where it is the most difficult! #AN # FH2012

177080702330875905.text: This rally of socialists, left-wing radicals, and Robert Hue's movement is a beautiful unity. # FH2012

177018321961615361.text: I call on the President and the Prime Minister to be restrained and not to offend a certain number of consciences. # FH2012
